ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Block on Stolen(Delete)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>Block on Stolen Process - Prepaid. Confirm the following from customer
	<ul>
		<li>Balance when SIM was lost</li>
		<li>FNF added</li>
		<li>Offer/Bundle/VAS active on number</li>
		<li>Any other Jazz Number active on Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>package plan</li>
		<li>last recharge (as last option)</li>
		<li>Note: If customer is calling from Same Account then no alternate verification is required</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Block on Stolen Process - Postpaid
	<ul>
		<li>Block number if caller verifies Name + CNIC and any one of the below verification</li>
		<li>Last Invoice Amount</li>
		<li>FNF Added</li>
		<li>VAS Active on Number</li>
		<li>Any other Jazz Number active on Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>Package Plan</li>
		<li>last recharge (as last option)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Note: If customer is calling from Same Account then no alternate verification is required</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 41,1045,27
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: taimoor.agha
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 36
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Block on Stolen is considered as one of the most critical scenarios for which customer calls over helpline and it was one of the major reasons for customer dissatisfaction in CFL as well. From now onwards, do&nbsp;not probe &ldquo;Any one of the numbers dialed during last 10 days&rdquo; as an alternate verification.</li>
	<li>At Business Center and Franchise, follow above additional verification process if customer is unable to show Original CNIC</li>
	<li>Mention verification in comments as per current practice</li>
	<li>At the time of Restoration (from Block on Stolen), need to verify any one of the additional information as well (it can be other than additional verification provided at the time of blocking)</li>
	<li>All other mechanics related to Block on Stolen/Restoration will remain the same</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Block on Stolen
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>Block on Stolen Process - Prepaid. Confirm the following from customer
	<ul>
		<li>Balance when SIM was lost</li>
		<li>FNF added</li>
		<li>Offer/Bundle/VAS active on number</li>
		<li>Any other Jazz Number active on Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>package plan</li>
		<li>last recharge (as last option)</li>
		<li>Note: If customer is calling from Same Account then no alternate verification is required</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Block on Stolen Process - Postpaid
	<ul>
		<li>Block number if caller verifies Name + CNIC and any one of the below verification</li>
		<li>Last Invoice Amount</li>
		<li>FNF Added</li>
		<li>VAS Active on Number</li>
		<li>Any other Jazz Number active on Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>Package Plan</li>
		<li>last recharge (as last option)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Note: If customer is calling from Same Account then no alternate verification is required</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 41,1045,27
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: taimoor.agha
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 36
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Block on Stolen is considered as one of the most critical scenarios for which customer calls over helpline and it was one of the major reasons for customer dissatisfaction in CFL as well. From now onwards, do&nbsp;not probe &ldquo;Any one of the numbers dialed during last 10 days&rdquo; as an alternate verification.</li>
	<li>At Business Center and Franchise, follow above additional verification process if customer is unable to show Original CNIC</li>
	<li>Mention verification in comments as per current practice</li>
	<li>At the time of Restoration (from Block on Stolen), need to verify any one of the additional information as well (it can be other than additional verification provided at the time of blocking)</li>
	<li>All other mechanics related to Block on Stolen/Restoration will remain the same</li>
</ul>

Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Change of Ownership Prepaid+ Postpaid
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>30 days check for Change of Ownership has been implemented on New Sales (both Prepaid &amp; Postpaid) ? For change of ownership, customer need to visit Jazz Office or franchise with original CNIC</li>
	<li>? We cannot perform change of ownership against ported in numbers that belong to other operators (NDC). This is also includes where customer visit our office to disown other NDC ported in numbers completely and we cannot transfer ownership of such cases from 668 to any name as well. Please guide customers accordingly ? Note: Ownership of ported in numbers of Jazz NDC can be changed once it get activated on Jazz&rsquo;s network (being parent network) after 30 days of successful port back or issuance of duplicate SIM.</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Network Complaints Outgoing Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer contacts us for outgoing complaint then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1045
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: taimoor.agha
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: ,1061
Point of Contact: Network Complaint Unit
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Agent will launch below SR in Siebel with complete details:
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Type of SR: Cellular Complaint</li>
		<li>Area: Postpaid/Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Area: Outgoing Calls</li>
		<li>Sub Type: (As per Complaint)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Number should be active</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Check HLR for Parameter issues and launched OMT activity if issue found</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Status of Party B (Jazz number)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Confirm if diverts are active on Party B; then should communicate code ##002# prior forwarding complaint</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Probe for exact issue (error message)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Known Issue on NTT page in eFront</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">For prepaid numbers, below process needs to be followed</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Sir, Aap ne jo akhri call 0300/0321/ etc. pay ki thi us main XYZ issue aaraha tha ?</span></span></span></span></span>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">If multiple issues updated on NTT for same cell ID then we need to probe for City</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">If No, will ask for time, duration &amp; prefix etc. to identify the exact Cell ID and paste in NTT (Efront) to check known issues</span></span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">If any open ticket is there only then probe location and area. No need to ask Exact Address or Handset</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Along with launching complaint/guiding known issue, we also need to guide customer to check with different handset too</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Country Code feature functioning</span></span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">T</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">ake the <strong><em>Country Code</em></strong> from CDR (Siebel)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Step 2</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">: Agent will search this particular country code from <strong><em>NTT page</em></strong></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Step 3</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">: If there is <strong>Open </strong>trouble ticket in NTT then agent will not acknowledge the complaints and will guide customer as per normal SOP <strong>(Punching of work code is mandatory in this case)</strong></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Step 4: </span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">If there is closed ticket then agent will pick<strong> Site Code </strong>from NTT and will search this site code from Static Map</span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Step 5:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"> Check Static Map coverage:</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Once location found at Map, CCR will follow below matrix to log complaint for NCU</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Where Country Code in Siebel or cell site against ALOC is not available in NTT then agent will probe for customer location and consult NTT</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">For Postpaid customers we can take country code from Data tickets in Siebel CDR&rsquo;s and follow above steps and for other complaints you can directly ask the location, then verify the coverage status from NTT/Static Map</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3rd Floor</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Duration</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul style="margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px">
	<li>Party B number</li>
	<li>Error Message</li>
	<li>Duration of complaint</li>
	<li>Location</li>
	<li>Other contact number</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If NTT shows Jammers in the Area then we need to inform customer that there are Jammers installed in the area and customer may face network issue at this location</li>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>For number busy error on incoming calls(Party B), activation of ICS should be checked. In case ICS is active we will guide customer to change screening mode (Blacklist). If ICS is not active then guide customer that it is handset related feature</li>
	<li>For diverts cancellation, we need to guide ##002# along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than PCO/Dongle Service Class)</li>
	<li>Dongle Service Class is voice barred; we will not acknowledge incoming/outgoing complaint</li>
	<li>IVR (short codes) connectivity related issues (except 230) will be catered as Operational complaint (coverage is mandatory)</li>
	<li>0900 numbers are not dial able from mobile. No complaint will be launched in this case</li>
	<li>If customer is unable call on all numbers OR any particular number and getting Network related message, like &lsquo;Network Busy, Call Failed, Call end without any message&rsquo; etc. We will process QoS</li>
	<li>related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>For barring cancellation, we need to guide #33*0000# code along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than Dongle Service Class). This code is disabled now</li>
	<li>Sub Type PTCL will be used for connectivity issue on short codes (like 1217, 1218, 1122, 115, 117 etc.) and all UAN numbers</li>
	<li>Handset related issues: Call Not Allowed - Fixed dialing, Check Operator Service - Send My Caller ID is set No</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 55

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Online Payments Not Posted
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h2><a name="_Toc4474863">Process at Call Center and Communication Unit</a></h2>

<ul>
	<li>Consulting system if payment is not posted, guide customer to contact the same bank/helpline from where payment was made (Only against payments where banking channel involved i.e. Through ATM, Online Banking or Payment through any bank)</li>
	<li>If customer insist that he has contacted his/her bank and bank says there is no issue at their end or not willing to contact bank, in this case we will acknowledge the customer complaint</li>
	<li>SR Type: Bill Adjustment --&gt; &quot;Postpaid Bill Payment&quot; --&gt; &quot;Payment Not Posted&quot;</li>
</ul>

<h2><a name="_Toc4474864"></a></h2>

<h2>Process at Business Center</h2>

<ul>
	<li>consulting system if payment is not posted, guide customer to contact the same bank/helpline from where payment was made (Only against payments where banking channel involved i.e. Through ATM, Online Banking or Payment through any bank)</li>
	<li>If customer insist that he has contacted his/her bank and bank says there is no issue at their end or not willing to contact bank, in this case we will acknowledge the customer complaint</li>
	<li>SR Type: Bill Adjustment &agrave; &quot;Postpaid Bill Payment&quot; &agrave; &quot;Payment Not Posted&quot;</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><a name="_Toc4474865">Process at Franchise Center</a></h2>

<ul>
	<li>consulting system if payment is not posted, guide customer to contact the same bank/helpline from where payment was made (Only against payments where banking channel involved i.e. Through ATM, Online Banking or Payment through any bank)</li>
	<li>If customer insist that he has contacted his/her bank and bank says there is no issue at their end or not willing to contact bank, in this case we will acknowledge the customer complaint</li>
	<li>SR Type: Bill Adjustment &agrave; &quot;Postpaid Bill Payment&quot; &agrave; &quot;Payment Not Posted&quot;</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><a name="_Toc4474866">Process at Retailer</a></h2>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to visit nearest office or call on helpline for assistance</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,35,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: taimoor.agha
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 26
Point of Contact: via Contact Center Team Leader
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Consult the Siebel for payments</li>
	<li>computerized receipt or online transaction ID</li>
	<li>Customer claims online payment</li>
	<li>We need to check if payment status is &quot;Successful&quot; or &quot;Recon&quot; in eFront--&gt;Payment Not Posted tab only then we will acknowledge complaint</li>
	<li>Incase failed status then guide customer to&nbsp;contact respective Bank (No complaint to be acknowledged in this case)</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>We need to ensure following points if complaint is required to process after above check list</li>
	<li>We will forward the complaint/mentioned SR if customer having computerized receipt or online transaction ID</li>
	<li>We will not cater any complaints for payment not updated cases, if customer has manual receipt or transaction ID, please route customers to point of payment to collect computerized receipt or transaction ID before registering complaint</li>
	<li>If postpaid customer complains that his payment is not updated while 24 hours have lapsed, it is mandatory to confirm from customer the MSISDN mentioned in receipt. Incase MSISDN is different from customer&#39;s number then we will route customer to the same office with receipt. We will only cater &#39;Payment not updated&#39; complaint if customer&rsquo;s number and the number mentioned on receipt are same or customer is providing online payment transaction ID</li>
	<li>In payment not updated complaints if customer number is OG barred (due to exceed limit) and insisting to restore the number then CCR should escalate the case to TL. TL can restore the number after verifying the issue and as per customer profile</li>
	<li>TL should keep number in follow up so that if payment not updated after 24 hours then he can intimate to CRM for monitoring and appropriate action</li>
</ul>

Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Power Tool Complaints
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h2><a name="_Toc13665214">Process at Call Center and Communication Unit</a></h2>

<ul>
	<li>For all the service having deactivation option in portal should be catered upfront</li>
	<li>Where service portal is not available, first guide customer to use USSD un-sub process and will launch eFront activity only if iSMS sent, USSD process attempted, and attempt reflecting in Siebel CDRs</li>
	<li>Efront --&gt; Creator --&gt; respective service sub / unsub / Trouble shoot</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><a name="_Toc13665215">Process at Business Center</a></h2>

<ul>
	<li>For all the service having deactivation option in portal should be catered upfront</li>
	<li>Where service portal is not available, first guide customer to use USSD un-sub process and will launch eFront activity only if iSMS sent, USSD process attempted, and attempt reflecting in Siebel CDRs</li>
	<li>Efront &agrave; Creator &agrave; respective service sub / unsub / Trouble shoot</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><a name="_Toc13665216">Process at Franchise Center</a></h2>

<ul>
	<li>For all the service having deactivation option in portal should be catered upfront</li>
	<li>Where service portal is not available, first guide customer to use USSD un-sub process and will launch eFront activity only if iSMS sent, USSD process attempted, and attempt reflecting in Siebel CDRs</li>
	<li>Efront &agrave; Creator &agrave; respective service sub / unsub / Trouble shoot</li>
	<li>Following is the list of product for which Efront activity can be created</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Handset Offer Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h2><a name="_Toc4474863">Process at Call Center and Communication Unit</a></h2>

<ul>
	<li>If data against IMEI exists in eFront then below will be the handling
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>If incentive posted then we will inform customer upfront that posing already made</li>
		<li>If there is any exception then consult Siebel and guide appropriate reason as mentioned below (No complaint will be launched in these cases)
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li>MSISDN is Postpaid</li>
			<li>MSISDN is Noncommercial (Retailer/PCO etc.)</li>
			<li>3G Base rate not attached (We will activate 3G and incentive will be posted automatically next day)</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Handset incentive posting details in eFront is updated daily at 4:30 PM (means incentive posted after 4:00 PM will reflect in eFront next day after 4:30 PM)</li>
	<li>IF data against IMEI does not exist in eFront even after 72 hours of inserting SIM in Slot-1 then SR will be created for backend team as per existing guidelines</li>
	<li>Create complaint for backend
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>SR Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Billing Adjustment</li>
		<li>Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit Note</li>
		<li>Sub Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; VAS Features</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Required Questions for SR
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>Handset IMEI number</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Adjustment - Subscription Charges Issue
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><a name="_Toc3577874">Process at Business Center</a></h2>

<ol>
	<li>Amount deducted visible in Siebel but respective bundle not subscribed</li>
	<li>Deduction of bundle higher than the price</li>
	<li>Check auto rollback amount (cases where transaction failed and amount is charged, system auto reverses the amount in customer&rsquo;s account within couple of minutes) &ndash; Check from CDRs</li>
</ol>

<p><strong>&nbsp;Handling:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Wrong deduction identified through checklist and deduction amount is less than Rs. 100</li>
	<li>Agent to make activity in eFront for amount posting and guide respective TAT to customer</li>
	<li>Activity to be routed to team leader for approval</li>
	<li>Team leader will approve the activity and posting request will be logged in system</li>
	<li>Auto generated log
	<ul style="list-style-type:square">
		<li>Will be directly populated in bulk posting uploader for posting(or)</li>
		<li>Will be shared with Jazz Adjustment Team for Bulk posting via uploader
		<ol>
			<li>Both options are in review phase</li>
		</ol>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Wrong deduction identified through above checklist and deduction amount is more than or equal to Rs. 100</li>
	<li>Agent to create service request by selecting the following options in Siebel
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Type of SR:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Billing adjustment</li>
		<li>Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit note</li>
		<li>Sub Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Subscription Charges</li>
		<li>Summary: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Offer Name</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Bundle activated but incentive not posted/partial incentive posting</li>
	<li>Agent to create service request by selecting the following options in Siebel
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Type of SR:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Billing adjustment</li>
		<li>Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit note</li>
		<li>Sub Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Subscription Charges</li>
		<li>Summary: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Offer Name</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,35,1051,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 43
Point of Contact: via Contact Center Team Leader
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Amount deducted visible in Siebel but respective bundle not subscribed</li>
	<li>Deduction of bundle higher than the price</li>
	<li>Check auto rollback amount (cases where transaction failed and amount is charged, system auto reverses the amount in customer&rsquo;s account within couple of minutes) &ndash; Check from CDRs</li>
	<li>Agent to check eFront and Service Requests history to confirm if same instructions for the same complaint already exist.</li>
	<li>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Confirm deduction in Seibel of particular bundle for CDRs</li>
		<li>Check bundle visibility in Installed assets</li>
		<li>Confirm date &amp; time of subscription:</li>
		<li>Check missing min</li>
		<li>Check missing SMS</li>
		<li>Missing MBs</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Adjustment - Package Plan Related
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h2>Wrongly/over charged on change in Package plan</h2>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Wrong deduction identified through checklist and deduction amount is less than Rs. 100</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Agent to make activity in eFront for amount posting and guide respective TAT to customer</li>
	<li>Activity to be routed to team leader for approval</li>
	<li>Team leader will approve the activity and posting request will be logged in system</li>
	<li>Auto generated log
	<ul style="list-style-type:square">
		<li>will be directly populated in bulk posting uploader for posting(or)</li>
		<li>will be shared with Jazz Adjustment Team for Bulk posting via uploader</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><a name="_Toc3577874">Process at Business Center</a></h2>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Scenario- Customer wrongly/over charged on change in Package plan</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Wrong deduction identified through checklist and deduction amount is less than Rs. 100</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Agent to make activity in eFront for amount posting and guide respective TAT to customer</li>
	<li>Activity to be routed to team leader for approval</li>
	<li>Team leader will approve the activity and posting request will be logged in system</li>
	<li>Auto generated log
	<ul style="list-style-type:square">
		<li>will be directly populated in bulk posting uploader for posting(or)</li>
		<li>will be shared with Jazz Adjustment Team for Bulk posting via uploader</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Wrong deduction identified through above checklist and deduction amount is more than or equal to Rs. 100</li>
	<li>Agent to create service request by selecting the following options in Siebel
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Type of SR:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Billing adjustment</li>

	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Complaint Description: <h2>&nbsp;</h2>

<h2><a name="_Toc3577874">Process at Business Center</a></h2>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Scenario- Customer wrongly/over charged on change in package plan</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Wrong deduction identified through checklist and deduction amount is less than Rs. 100</li>

	<li>Agent to make activity in eFront for amount posting and guide respective TAT to customer</li>
	<li>Activity to be routed to team leader for approval</li>
	<li>Team leader will approve the activity and posting request will be logged in system</li>
	<li>Auto generated log
	<ul style="list-style-type:square">
		<li>will be directly populated in bulk posting uploader for posting(or)</li>
		<li>will be shared with Jazz Adjustment Team for Bulk posting via uploader</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<li>Detailed Description: Overcharged on calling FNF</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>

	<li>Answer 3: SMS Status Delivered/Failed</li>
	<li>Answer 4: Count of Undelivered SMS</li>
	<li>Answer 5: Total Wrongly Charged Amount</li>
	<li>Answer 6: Date Of Wrong Deduction</li>
</ul>

<ul style="margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px">

	<li>Detailed Description:</li>
	<li>Date &amp; Time Of Subscription:</li>
	<li>Date &amp; Time Of Wrong Charging Issue:</li>
	<li>Stuck Free SMS Count:</li>
	<li>Answer 1: SMS</li>
	<li>Answer 2: Party B Number</li>
	<li>Answer 3: SMS Status Delivered / Failed</li>
	<li>Answer 4: Count of Charged SMS</li>
	<li>Answer 5: Total Wrongly Charged Amount</li>
	<li>Answer 6: Date Of Wrong Deduction</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Response for MNP to 667 â€“ Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer facing issue in receiving response from 667 MNP short code &amp; contact any of the touch points</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,27
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>As per scenario</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul style="margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px">
	<li>No response received</li>
	<li>Incorrect response/data is received</li>
	<li>Syntax error (Confirm process i.e. MNP (no space) to 667)</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul style="margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px">
	<li>ntegration of 667: Now only Biometric verified numbers will be able to retrieve details by sending MNP to 667.</li>
	<li>Response against Pending Jazz Advance Numbers:</li>
	<li>Since Jazz advance availing number cannot be ported out till clearance of Jazz Advance amount, below response will be sent to these customers on sending MNP to 667
	<ul>
		<li>Dear Subscriber, kindly settle your Advance Loan to receive the prescribed message reply. Thank you</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>As soon as customer recharges and clears Jazz Advance full amount then normal response with complete details will be sent after sending MNP to 667</li>
	<li>Response against Passport ID</li>
	<li>Now Passport/PoR ID numbers will also receive their details by sending MNP to 667, however Passport/PoR Info will be visible against CNIC head in 667 Response SMS. For Example:
	<ul>
		<li>MSISDN:03057003478,NAME:FENGMING,CNIC:G50488902,IMSI:123456789012,ACTIVATION-DATE:11-11-2011,CONNECTION-TYPE:PRE</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Note: All other Port In/out mechanics, checklist and handing will remains the same</li>
	<li>For postpaid numbers Siebel is primary CRM for port in / port out</li>
	<li>For prepaid port Ins /Port outs ePoint is being used as primary CRM. In case of &lsquo;No data&rsquo; in epoint and &ldquo;S&rdquo; tag numbers data will be retrieved from Siebel</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong><em>Process at Business Center, Communication Unit and Call Center :-</em></strong></p>

<p>CCR/BCE will launch below SR in Siebel:</p>

<p>Required Questions:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Number of B Party:</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>Error Message (Sending failed/Unable to send, Messages are sent but not received on a number: Confirm if Party B is receiving SMS from all other numbers)</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>Duration of Complaint:</li>
	<li>City</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Type of SR: Cellular Complaint (smart script) -- Area: Postpaid/Prepaid -- Sub Area: Incoming SMS &ndash; Sub Type: Incoming Jazz / Incoming All / Incoming OMO / Incoming &amp; Outgoing / EoCN Alerts Issue</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><em>Process at Franchise Center</em></strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>In the absence of Static Map and NTT page, FCCR will launch complaint with available details and check list</li>
	<li>For complaint creation we will follow Contact Center process</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><em>Process at Retailer</em></strong></p>

<p>Guide customer to dial helpline</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,35,1051
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 1061
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Ask Customer to Empty Message Memory/Create Space in phone</li>
	<li>Check Active Status check (Party A,B)</li>
	<li>Known issue NTT</li>
	<li>Party B is successfully sending SMS to all other numbers</li>
	<li>Duration</li>
	<li>Error</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>Number should be active</li>
	<li>Status of Party B (Mobilink number)</li>
	<li>Confirm if diverts are active then should communicate code ##002# prior forwarding complaint</li>
	<li>Probe for exact issue (error message)</li>
	<li>Known Issue on NTT page in eFront
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><strong>T</strong>ake the <strong><em>Country Code</em></strong> from CDR (Siebel)</li>
		<li><strong>Step 2</strong>: Agent will search this particular country code from <strong><em>NTT page</em></strong></li>
		<li><strong>Step 3</strong>: If there is <strong>Open </strong>trouble ticket in NTT then agent will not acknowledge the complaints and will guide customer as per normal SOP <strong>(Punching of work code is mandatory in this case)</strong></li>
		<li><strong>Step 4: </strong>If there is closed ticket then agent will pick<strong> Site Code </strong>from NTT and will search this site code from Static Map</li>
		<li><strong>Step 5:</strong> Check Static Map coverage:</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Important Guidelines:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Where Country Code in Siebel or cell site against ALOC is not available in NTT then agent will probe for customer location and consult NTT</li>
	<li><em>For Postpaid customers we can take country code from Data tickets in Siebel CDR&rsquo;s and follow above steps and for other complaints you can directly ask the location, then verify the coverage status from NTT/Static Map</em></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3rd Floor</li>
	<li>Check screening folder for Blacklist call/SMS block service</li>
	<li>Incase SMS are not being received from specific short codes then after confirming from respective Sendor, customer can get complaint launched at Jazz</li>
</ul>

Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong><em>Process at Business Center, Communication Unit and Call Center :-</em></strong></p>

<p>CCR/BCE will launch below SR in Siebel after taking below Details:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><em>PTC Number:</em></li>
	<li><em>Error Message</em></li>
	<li><em>Duration of Complaint:</em></li>
	<li><em>City</em></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Type of SR: Cellular Complaint (smart script) -- Area: Postpaid/Prepaid -- Sub Area: Outgoing Calls &ndash; Sub Type: (As per Complaint)</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><em>Process at Franchise Center</em></strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>In the absence of Static Map and NTT page, FCCR will launch complaint with available details and check list</li>
	<li>For complaint creation we will follow Contact Center process</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><em>Process at Retailer</em></strong></p>

<p>Guide customer to dial helpline</p>

		<li><strong>Step 4: </strong>If there is closed ticket then agent will pick<strong> Site Code </strong>from NTT and will search this site code from Static Map</li>
		<li><strong>Step 5:</strong> Check Static Map coverage:</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

Main Header: B2C

Complaint Description: <p><strong><em>Process at Business Center, Communication Unit and Call Center :-</em></strong></p>

<p>CCR/BCE will launch below SR in Siebel after taking below Details:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><em>PTCL Number with Area Code</em></li>
	<li><em>Error Message by PTC Customer</em></li>
	<li><em>Duration of Complaint </em></li>
	<li><em>City (Exact Location of Jazz Customer)</em></li>
	<li><em>Other contact number </em></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Type of SR: Cellular Complaint (smart script) -- Area: Postpaid/Prepaid -- Sub Area: Incoming Calls &ndash; Sub Type: Incoming PTCL</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><em>Process at Franchise Center</em></strong></p>

Verification Status: 1061

Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>We will only acknowledge PTCL Incoming Complaint for the below mentioned messages:</li>
	<li>System cannot recognize this number dial 111</li>
	<li>Not responding at the moment</li>
	<li>Any other message from Jazz IVR</li>
	<li>Note: In all other cases we will guide the customer to check from PTCL end.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>Number should be active <a name="_Toc1045470"></a></li>

		<li><strong>Step 5:</strong> Check Static Map coverage:</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

</ul>

	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If NTT shows Jammers in the Area then we need to inform customer that there are Jammers installed in the area and customer may face network issue at this location</li>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>For number busy error on incoming calls(Party B), activation of ICS should be checked. In case ICS is active we will guide customer to change screening mode (Blacklist). If ICS is not active then guide customer that it is handset related feature</li>
	<li>For diverts cancellation, we need to guide ##002# along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than PCO/Dongle Service Class)</li>
	<li>Dongle Service Class is voice barred; we will not acknowledge incoming/outgoing complaint</li>
	<li>IVR (short codes) connectivity related issues (except 230) will be catered as Operational complaint (coverage is mandatory)</li>
	<li>0900 numbers are not dial able from mobile. No complaint will be launched in this case</li>
	<li>If customer is unable call on all numbers OR any particular number and getting Network related message, like &lsquo;Network Busy, Call Failed, Call end without any message&rsquo; etc. We will process QoS</li>
	<li>related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>For barring cancellation, we need to guide #33*0000# code along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than Dongle Service Class). This code is disabled now</li>
	<li>Sub Type PTCL will be used for connectivity issue on short codes (like 1217, 1218, 1122, 115, 117 etc.) and all UAN numbers</li>
	<li>Handset related issues: Call Not Allowed - Fixed dialing, Check Operator Service - Send My Caller ID is set No</li>
	<li>We don&rsquo;t make complaints for congestion / busy tone in case of PTCL incoming complaint</li>
	<li>Note that where any NCU related SR is completed &amp; customer complains for the same issue again after 15 days then we will forward fresh SR with required details instead of making escalation activity.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Escalation activity against such issues will only be forwarded if the related SR is less than 15 days old.</li>
	<li>Completion time will be checked in SR from &ldquo;Closed on&rdquo; Date.</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:600px">
			<p>We will Check if MPTY Service is active in Siebel &amp; HLR then we will launch activity under OMT Tab in eFront as per below scenario (Agent must check call waiting and call hold from HLR whether both are enable or not)</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<ul>
				<li>Probe handset compatibility for conferencing option</li>
				<li>Sufficient Balance to Initiate Conference Call (for Prepaid)</li>
			</ul>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>o If MPTY parameters are missing in HLR and MPTY service is activated in Siebel then launch &ldquo;<strong>MPTY Activation</strong>&rdquo;- TAT: 1 hours</p>

			<p>o If Call Hold parameters are missing in HLR and MPTY service is activated in Siebel then launch &ldquo;<strong>Reset CH</strong>&rdquo;-TAT: 1 hours</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p><strong>Note:</strong> RESET CH activity needs to be processed if customer complains he/she is unable to put the first call on hold to attend the second call. Please note if CW is properly active then customer will receive the intimation of an incoming call however if hold option is not working properly then customer might receive an error while putting first call on hold</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; width:121px">
			<p><strong>ICS &nbsp;Complaint</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:600px">
			<ul>
				<li>Check if ICS Service is active in Siebel &amp; HLR then we will launch activity under OMT Tab in eFront as per below scenario:</li>
			</ul>

			<p>o If ICS parameters are missing in HLR and ICS service is activate in Siebel then launch &ldquo;Activate ICS&rdquo;- TAT: 1 hours</p>

			<p><strong>Note:</strong> Other than activation complaint we will make relevant SR in Seibel.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; width:121px">
			<p><strong>Outgoing Complaint- (Error: Powered Off)</strong></p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:600px">
			<p>If customer complaints that on dialing Party B Number &ndash; Error: &ldquo;<strong>Powered Off</strong>&rdquo; is received</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>We need to check two options in NTLHR</p>

			<ol>
				<li>If &ldquo;Mobile station purged by VLR&rdquo; option is checked in &ldquo;Mobility Data&rdquo; option</li>
				<li>If &ldquo;Mobile station not reachable&rdquo;&nbsp;is checked in &ldquo;SMS MT &ndash; Message Waiting Data&rdquo;</li>
			</ol>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<ul>
				<li>If both are checked it means Number is Powered Off and no complaint is required.</li>
				<li>If only first option is selected, then we need to guide Party B number is required to do manual network selection. No complaint in this regard.</li>
			</ul>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; width:121px">
			<p><strong>CLIR Activation</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:600px">
			<p>This request is processed on the directives of PTA via CRA team (Designated person)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; width:121px">
			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:600px">
			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Note</strong>: Detailed HLR Navigation document is available on Mobics under Quick Help for ready reference</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>OMT Activities to be Created:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Call Hold: eFront &ndash; OMT Tab - Activity Type - RESET CH</li>
	<li>Voice Barring: eFront &ndash; OMT Tab - Type of Activity - Voice Barring</li>
	<li>Wrong Diverts Cancellation: eFront &ndash; OMT Tab - Type of Activity &ndash; RESET CF</li>
	<li>Resetting CLI: eFront &ndash; OMT Tab - Type of Activity &ndash; RESET CLI</li>
	<li>Resetting CW: eFront &ndash; OMT Tab - Type of Activity &ndash; RESET CW</li>
	<li>SMS Barring/Check Operator Service: eFront &ndash; OMT Tab - Type of Activity &ndash; SMS Barring</li>
	<li>Active in Siebel but admin barred in switch: eFront &ndash; OMT Tab - Type of Activity &ndash; Restoration</li>
	<li>Resuming INACT or 668 Blocked number: eFront &ndash; OMT Tab - Type of Activity &ndash; 668 Barring</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>TAT: 1 Hours for all OMT related eFront activities</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Important Guidelines:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Where Country Code in Siebel or cell site against ALOC is not available in NTT then agent will probe for customer location and consult NTT</li>
	<li><em>For Postpaid customers we can take country code from Data tickets in Siebel CDR&rsquo;s and follow above steps and for other complaints you can directly ask the location, then verify the coverage status from NTT/Static Map</em></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3rd Floor</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If NTT shows Jammers in the Area then we need to inform customer that there are Jammers installed in the area and customer may face network issue at this location</li>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>Dongle Service Class is voice barred; we will not acknowledge incoming/outgoing complaint</li>
	<li>If customer is unable call on all numbers OR any particular number and getting Network related message, like &lsquo;Network Busy, Call Failed, Call end without any message&rsquo; etc. We will process QoS related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>Handset related issues: Call Not Allowed - Fixed dialing, Check Operator Service - Send My Caller ID is set No</li>
	<li>Same complaint will be processed for QoS complaints (i.e. No audio/Audio loop back, Echo or call drop) on ISD calls only</li>
	<li>For Insufficient balance issue on ISD calls; we will forward Insufficient balance complaint</li>
</ul>

<p>Guide customer not to call back the ISD number from receiving list. Dial the number by punching on keypad</p>

Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

	<li>Status of Party B (Mobilink number)</li>
	<li>Confirm if diverts are active then should communicate code ##002# prior forwarding complaint</li>
	<li>Probe for exact issue (error message)</li>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><strong>T</strong>ake the <strong><em>Country Code</em></strong> from CDR (Siebel)</li>
		<li><strong>Step 2</strong>: Agent will search this particular country code from <strong><em>NTT page</em></strong></li>

		<li><strong>Step 5:</strong> Check Static Map coverage:</li>

	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint.</li>
	<li>Handling for network issues like Signal, Call Drop, Call Connectivity issues etc. faced due to Power Failure issues only:</li>
	<li>As per our current practice ; after probing if we identified that issue is due to power failure only (network issue is faced only during WAPDA outage) then we will inform customer (all segments) upfront that issue is being faced due to prolonged power failure and will be resolved when overall situation gets better.</li>
	<li>From Now onwards we will not make self-completed Signal Related SR instead we will make entry in NTT page against Power failure Work Codes in KNOWN TICKETS and/ or NETWORK TICKETS as per customer complaint.</li>
	<li>In case customer faces issue like call congestion or call drop etc. during power failure only, then also we will make entry against power failure</li>
	<li>Exceptions can be forwarded to team leaders. Team Leaders can process Power Failure complaints for such cases and they need to send email to relevant NCU Team as well along with processing SR only in exceptional cases.</li>
	<li>We will not make escalation activities on already created/ completed activities and handle customers, as per above mentioned guidelines.</li>
	<li>If NTT is open, we need to punch NTT as we are not forwarding any complaint in this scenario</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 4476

			<p><strong>NO Coverage </strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:92px">
			<p>CCR will not entertain complaint but will only lock work code &nbsp;in efront as per existing process, CCR will politely guide customer about <strong>No coverage</strong> in that area informing that we are trying to provide coverage in these areas as soon as possible</p>
			</td>
			<td rowspan="2" style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:92px">
			<p><strong>work code: pertaining to customer query</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:none; border-left:none; border-right:none; border-top:none; height:92px; width:0px">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:.2in">
			<p><strong>TAT:</strong> No timeline</p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:none; border-left:none; border-right:none; border-top:none; height:19px; width:0px">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>For HV we acknowledge compliant immediately where as in LV we ask customer about temporary issue advised to check after 2 hours, in case more than 2 hours we should lunch the complaint.</li>
	<li>If NTT shows Jammers in the Area then we need to inform customer that there are Jammers installed in the area and customer may face network issue at this location</li>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>For number busy error on incoming calls(Party B), activation of ICS should be checked. In case ICS is active we will guide customer to change screening mode (Blacklist). If ICS is not active then guide customer that it is handset related feature</li>
	<li>For diverts cancellation, we need to guide ##002# along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than PCO/Dongle Service Class)</li>
	<li>Dongle Service Class is voice barred; we will not acknowledge incoming/outgoing complaint</li>
	<li>IVR (short codes) connectivity related issues (except 230) will be catered as Operational complaint (coverage is mandatory)</li>
	<li>0900 numbers are not dial able from mobile. No complaint will be launched in this case</li>
	<li>If customer is unable call on all numbers OR any particular number and getting Network related message, like &lsquo;Network Busy, Call Failed, Call end without any message&rsquo; etc. We will process QoS</li>
	<li>related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>For barring cancellation, we need to guide #33*0000# code along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than Dongle Service Class). This code is disabled now</li>
	<li>Sub Type PTCL will be used for connectivity issue on short codes (like 1217, 1218, 1122, 115, 117 etc.) and all UAN numbers</li>
	<li>Handset related issues: Call Not Allowed - Fixed dialing, Check Operator Service - Send My Caller ID is set No</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Buffer SMS complaint will be catered on immediate basis &amp; Irrespective of coverage area with clear notepad details</li>
	<li>Whenever customer complains about International SMS/MMS sending, we will check details of collaboration with the operator in the specific country in the sheet updated on mobics and handle complain accordingly. However, if a customer is unable to tell the Operator name even then we will launch complaint with available details</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Balance Reversal Complaint(R)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Warid
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>Retailer can reverse 3 Jazz/Warid Prepaid Load transactions up to 500 by self-service Procedure only if Complete Balance will be available in his IN account.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>In case balance was consume by customer than we process complaint. If balance was less than 20 than we don&rsquo;t process complaint due to in sufficient balance in customer IN account.</li>
	<li>If balance is less than RS 20 we guide upfront to retailer that Balance is consumed by Customer.</li>
	<li>If balance is above than RS 20 then makes Complaint in RTG portal and Retailer can log Three Complaint in a Day. If retailer call on 1344 helpline after 9:00 PM then TAT for reversal is next morning 8 AM to 12 PM.</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1046
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>RTG portal --&gt; Click on Login--&gt; Log Complaint --&gt;Search Retailer number --&gt; Check Retailer&rsquo;s Last Complaints&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Answer&nbsp;1:&nbsp; Retailer MSISDN</li>
	<li>Answer 2 Wrong Subscriber MSISDN</li>
	<li>Answer&nbsp;3: Reversal&nbsp;Amount</li>
	<li>Answer&nbsp;4: EVC Transaction ID&nbsp;(One Enter in TID Box &amp; Rest of Transactions ID&rsquo;s will be Enter in Creator Remarks Box</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>EVC Transaction Details</li>
	<li>Verify Siebel IN Tab</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p><a name="_Hlk17808463"><strong>Note: </strong></a>We will not acknowledge complaint and handle query upfront if:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:square">
	<li>Retailer didn&rsquo;t have Customer Number or Transaction ID&nbsp;or any Load Information</li>
	<li>If Balance is less then RS 20.</li>
	<li>If Retailer Successfully reverse via *510# USSD</li>
	<li>If Complete Balance is available then Front end CCR will guide self-service if retailer insists than launch complaint in RTG Portal up to 500.</li>
	<li>If balance is 500 or above Then Customer Consent is mandatory, for Consent wave off for prepaid Complaint will be locked by DO/Master.</li>
</ul>

	<ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: DIRBS Activity Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Given handling is followed for cases where customer asks about&nbsp;Device Identification, Registration and Blocking System (DIRBS) and any handling related error due to DIRBS</p>

Submission Channel: 37,5,4,27,35,26,32,39,34,7,38,36,33
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 26
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>E-front &rarr; Creator &rarr; DIRBS activity</li>
	<li>If IMEI matches with the customer information then&nbsp; create an activity in E-Front &rarr;&nbsp;Creator &rarr;&nbsp;Activity Type &rarr;&nbsp;Help Desk Escalation (to be selected) &rarr;&nbsp;Reason &rarr;&nbsp;Other (to be selected)
	<ul>
		<li>It is mandatory to add keyword &ldquo;DIRBS&rdquo; in description</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>A customer can face below-mentioned issues &amp; possible errors on their devices if they are not paired:
	<ul>
		<li>Sim Card Registration Failed</li>
		<li>No Network</li>
		<li>Emergency Calls Only</li>
		<li>while creating activity in E-front agent will make sure to add below information for better customer handling.</li>
		<li>Activity will be created on effected MSISDN by adding below details in description
		<ul>
			<li>IMEI Number (Need to confirm from customer)</li>
			<li>Other contact number</li>
			<li>DIRBS Keyword</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>In case of paired/non-paired confirmation will be sent on other contact number</li>
	<li>Customer can import only 5 devices in a calendar year</li>
	<li>Duty can be paid at Airport Custom Kiosk &amp; it can also be paid in nationwide FBR offices</li>
	<li>1 device can be registered without paying duty in a year</li>
	<li>Custom officials will assess the device for applicable tax and inform customer to pay charges at any nearest National bank branch</li>
	<li>Since the local SIM inserted, Customer will have 15 day grace period to pay duty, in case they fail to do so their devices will be locked in Pakistan</li>
	<li>PTA will notify customer through SMS to pay duty during grace period</li>
	<li>Device will fall in below mentioned 2 categories from 1st Dec, 2018 onwards</li>
	<li>Complaint need to be forwarded for all sim slots if device have more than 1 sim slot</li>
	<li>Before forwarding any complaint for backend, first agent will check the E-front log to verify the last complaint status if any</li>
	<li>Last pairing date was 1st Dec, 2018 after that any new connection will not be paired with non-compliant device</li>
	<li>In case of not approved status received from PTA, customer will follow the already shared PTA device registration process</li>
</ul>

<h3>Handling</h3>

<ul>
	<li>Ask customer IMEI number and MSISDN against which error is being faced</li>
	<li>Check the IMEI number in E-front &rarr;&nbsp;Creator &rarr;&nbsp;DIRBS activity</li>
	<li>Check details either by MSISDN with 92 or 15 digit IMEI number</li>
	<li>If number exists in the E-front then proceed further otherwise handle as per existing guidelines of the above mentioned errors</li>
	<li>If number is available in the list then customer&rsquo;s device is Non- Compliant as per 1st Dec, 2018 deadline with IMSI-IMEI miss matched</li>
	<li>Ask the customer about the last charged activity (Calls/SMS/Data usage) of the MSISDN</li>
	<li>If IMEI matches with the customer information then&nbsp; create an activity in E-Front&nbsp;&rarr;&nbsp;Creator &rarr;&nbsp;Activity Type &rarr;&nbsp;Help Desk Escalation (to be selected) &rarr;&nbsp;Reason &rarr;&nbsp;Other (to be selected)</li>
	<li>It is mandatory to add keyword &ldquo;DIRBS&rdquo; in description</li>
	<li>Guide customer that request has been logged and TAT will be 48 hours</li>
	<li>Guide customer that after verification with PTA records, if particular MSISDN was used before 2nd Dec, 2018 in the device then it will be activated within 48 hours and confirmation will also be received through text message</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 3240

Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

<ul>
	<li>if any Jazz customer calls over helpline and complains that he/she is receiving calls from different numbers since Party B number has activated wrong diverts towards his number (mistakenly or without customer consent )
	<ul>
		<li>In such case we need to proactively probe the number from customer to further validate the issue through HLR.</li>
		<li>If customer can confirm the number, then
		<ul>
			<li>We need to check that number in HLR under forwarding option by confirming details against all available status of call forwarding option (unconditional, not reachable, no reply &amp; busy)</li>
			<li>If under forwarding calling customer number is available against &ldquo;Forwarded to number&rdquo; details then we need to generate Reset CF complaint in eFront against number who has activated wrong diverts along with mentioning calling customer number in notes.</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>This handling is applicable against Jazz numbers only</li>
	<li>e will generate complaint only when customer calls from same CLI which is available in HLR under &ldquo; Forwarded to number&rdquo; .</li>
</ul>

			</td>

<ul>
	<li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Post to Pre Balance Share Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Handling for the cases where postpaid customer shared balance in prepaid account however balance not received</p>

<ul>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1050,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>For Failure Scenario:</strong> Amount will be reversed within an hour</p>

<p><strong>For Successful Scenario:</strong>&nbsp;Where balance is not posted in prepaid (due to any exception at IN), create SR as per following details</p>

<ul>
	<li>Type of SR:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Bill Adjustment</li>
	<li>Area:&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Credit Note</li>
	<li>Sub Area: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Post to Pre balance Complaint</li>
	<li>Description:&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Party B number</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check party B recharge history tab to verify if the balance has been received or not</li>
	<li>Probe customer about the confirmation message</li>
	<li>Ask customer the transaction ID</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Postpaid customers can transfer balance between amounts Rs.15 to Rs.500 to a Jazz Prepaid Number.</li>
	<li>Process to share balance:
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>*100*MSISDN*Amount#</li>
		<li>e.g. *100*030xxxxxxxx*500#</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>Service Charges:</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Rs.3.99 +tax/transaction (amount is rounded off to Rs.4+tax in notifications and Bill)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>Rules:</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>There is no limit on the number of transactions for a day. Any amount between Rs.15 and Rs500 can be transferred in multiple transactions and in any denominations.</li>
		<li>Maximum amount that can be transferred in one day is Rs.500.</li>
		<li>If customer has reached usage limit for postpaid number (as per defined Credit limit in CRM) they will not be able to share balance.</li>
		<li>Service will be activated from Siebel on consumer catalog.</li>
		<li>Post to pre balance share service is available only to Postpaid consumer customers.</li>
		<li>New Sale numbers which have not yet generated first bill run will not be able to make Post to Prepaid balance share transactions</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>Postpaid Visibility:</strong>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Postpaid successful transaction visibility will be with CC-FMT (Financial Management Team) only in CAM Portal.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active

Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>Complaints for this process will be handled at helpline 0305-6785678</li>
	<li>Complaint Scenarios (Contact Center):</li>
	<li>1. Customer unable to register through Number Auction portal or Registration fee not getting charged via debit card/credit card or Jazz Cash wallet</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Probing:</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>? Agent will probe funds availability in Jazz cash/Debit or credit card and process followed by customer</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>In addition, agent will probe below points from customer and add them in activity notes field: ? Customer after filling form is unable to reach to payment gateway ? Customer is able to reach payment gateway but not getting charged for registration.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Efront Main Header: Online Number Auction Sub Header: Issue in registration through payment gateway</li>
	<li>Check list of complaint will include: ? Error message ? Payment Channel/Method: ? Contact number:</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>TAT: 2 hours for callback</li>
	<li>Backend complaint team will confirm below details from customer:</li>
	<li>Based on scenario backend complaint team will route to respective POC over email:</li>
	<li>For scenarios Customer after filling form is unable to reach to payment gateway. POC for this handling will be Jawad/Daud</li>
	<li>Customer is able to reach payment gateway but not getting charged for registration. Nimra and Saad (Digital Team) will be POC of this handling</li>
	<li>Back team will contact customer and update communication notes with customer in activity notes.</li>
	<li>2. Customer has been charged but not registered for online auction.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Customer will receive two email alerts: 1. Successful Registration (when registration form is filled) 2. Successful Activation (when successful payment is made)</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Probing: ? Agent will ask about above mentioned alerts ? Agent will ask customer whether deduction has been made from Jazz cash/Debit or credit card ? Agent will ask customer to check email in spam or junk emails (if email not received)</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>If still customer has not been registered to Auction login after payment deduction, then complaint will be created in Efront in below header:</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Main Header: Online Number Auction Sub Header: Registration Issue after Payment ? Bank Name: ? Mode of Payment# Credit/Debit or Jazz cash ? Date and time of Registration: ? Contact number</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>TAT: 2 hours for callback</li>

Daud Cheema &amp; Muhammad Jawad Hassan will then push registration of customer if successful payment is confirmed from Digital POC Back team will contact customer and update communication notes with customer in activity notes.</li>

Need to probe alert type as complaint will be forwarded against we are proving over email to customer</li>

	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Handling for the cases where customer request for data service activation</p>

Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.

Verification Status: 1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.

<ul>
	<li>Level: Account -- Order: Modify -- Type: Select GPRS Price Plan</li>
	<li>Create SR of cellular complaint- postpaid- VAS- GPRs&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Send settings to the customer</li>
	<li>Confirmation Call Back TAT: One Hour</li>
	<li><em><strong>Note:</strong></em> Guide customer to switch off &amp; on handset after 15 minutes. Need to mention other contact number in SR Type of SR- VAS Data Services &gt; GPRS &gt;Streaming issue</li>
</ul>

<h2>Prepaid</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Level: Account -- Order: Modify -- Type: GPRS</li>
	<li>Keep the GPRS boxes checked for activation</li>
	<li>Send settings to the customer</li>
	<li>TAT: Immediate (guide customer to switch off &amp; on handset)</li>
	<li><em><strong>Note:</strong></em> GPRS Deactivation &gt; Level: Account -- Type: Modify -- Type: uncheck GPRS</li>
</ul>

	<li>Check package plan</li>
	<li>Handset compatibility</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Guiding Charges (prepaid &amp; postpaid) &amp; confirming required GPRS Package Plan (for postpaid) is mandatory</li>
	<li>Please note that prepaid customers who request for IR activation, would continue using their data services in Pakistan</li>
	<li>Currently GPRS is already provisioned in all new prepaid sales</li>
</ul>

<p>Along with Modify order of GPRS deactivation 2,&nbsp;Agent&nbsp;to go to IN Asset Tab and remove the 4G base offer from Installed Assets</p>

<ul style="margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px">
	<li>GPRS Deactivation &gt; Level: Account -- Type: Modify -- Type: uncheck GPRS</li>
	<li>Along with Modify order of GPRS deactivation 2. Go to IN Asset Tab and remove the 4G base offer from Installed Assets</li>
</ul>

	<li>Need to confidently assure customers that protecting the customer information privacy is a high priority for us and we take all reasonable steps to protect customer&rsquo;s personal information from unauthorized use, access, modification or disclosure.</li>
	<li>Can also guide customers to refer to Customer Privacy Policy available at our commercial website</li>
	<li>Complaint Form is updated on website &amp; Mobics Quickhelp</li>
	<li>Need to print form &amp; handover customer to completely fill it.</li>
	<li>Request customer to provide any substantial evidence like print screen etc, (if available)</li>
	<li>Complaint will be forwarded even if customer don&rsquo;t have any physical evidence.</li>
	<li>Scan and email filled form along-with evidence to CUSTOMER DATA PROTECTION Team, Email Address: customerdataprotection@jazz.com.pk</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case any customer complaints regarding hacking of 3<sup>rd</sup> Party software like Whatsapp , Facebook etc, We&nbsp;will not acknowledge any complaint in this regard &amp; politely guide customer with below standard statement:</span></span>
	<ul>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Standard Statement</u></strong>:</span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&ldquo; Moaziz Saarif, Kisi bhe third party application jaisay whatsapp,facebook waghera ki hacking se bachnay k liay in application k PIN ya Password kisi ko mat bhejein, Hacking ki soorat mein mutalka software k support center per raabta karein, shukria!&rdquo;</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

View Type: ExperienceCenter
