ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Card Recharging Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer complains for card recharging issue then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 26
Point of Contact: TEC Team
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>For Prepaid and Jazz Postpaid:</p>

<p>Type of SR: Cellular Complaint --&gt; Area: Prepaid: Sub--&gt;Area: Card Recharging--&gt;Sub Type: Recharging Issue through IVR / Recharging Issue through USSD / Recharging Issue Through IVR &amp; USSD</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Known Issue NTT for any network issue</li>
	<li>Confirm Card Recharge Procedure (via USSD or IVR)</li>
	<li>Confirm if Error is received before entering 14 digits or after</li>
	<li>In case of invalid card ask customer to visit office</li>
	<li>In case of already used error received on very first attempt then guide customer to visit point of sale/shop from where card was purchased</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>In case while loading card, first time there is silence and second time Invalid number (with correct procedure) we will guide customer to visit office. However; if second time recording is already used then balance not updated complaint will be processed</li>
	<li>Customer can recharge account through USSD string without recharging a card through 123 IVR</li>
	<li>NEC, Sando and China made handsets are not compatible for USSD command. In case customer is using China handset, We will not acknowledge any complaint, we will politely guide him to follow the right procedure after changing his/her handset or where alternate IVR procedure is available we will guide customer accordingly as there is no issue with Chinese Handset on Card Recharge through IVR.</li>
	<li>Incase customer is still facing the issue after changing handset, then we will acknowledge complaint as per SOP</li>
	<li>We need to check the serial number in Siebel - Scratch Card &amp; Subscriber Info Tab to handle customer upfront for already used card cases</li>
	<li>While loading card for first time. If customer receives message &ldquo;card number incorrect OR Unable to process try again later&rdquo; and 2nd time customer is receiving message &ldquo;Card already charged&rdquo; we need to guide customer to visit the same place from where the card was purchased</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

Complaint Description: <h1>Process at Call Center</h1>

<p>In case of fluctuation/slow browsing related issues handling:</p>

<ul>

</ul>

<p>In case of Device not getting turned ON handling:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to check battery &amp; battery indicator Along with above remedy we will also guide customer that in case still issue persists, customer needs to visit respective Service Center of device with their faulty Jazz device. Customers from cities having no device service center can directly dispatch the device to GadgeIT</li>
</ul>

<p>No Signals/WIFI not establishing handling:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to insert DATA SIM by in handset to confirm SIM status Agent will also guide customer that in case issue still remain unresolved after above remedy, he needs to visit Jazz office to get SIM checked</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Duplicate Bill Handling (eFront Automated Solution)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Handling for the cases where postpaid customer request for duplicate bill or complaint for bill not received issue&nbsp;for the bill runs till 2nd Nov. 2021 will be sent through this eFront automated solution</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,1051,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>â€‹â€‹â€‹On receiving DB instructions from customer, requst will be launched in eFront by copying registered email address from Siebel</li>
	<li>eFront&rarr;Creator Tab&rarr;Duplicate Bill Request
	<ul>
		<li>Each month invoice will require new activity by selecting respective month.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Upon successful creation of activity, an auto-generated email containing Duplicate Bill shall be pushed in customer email ID from email address postpaidsupport@jazzgold.com</li>
	<li>Auto ISMS will be pushed on customer MSISDN for successful DB delivery</li>
	<li>Agents can search for previously created activity and ISMS History</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Verify email address available in Siebel/CSRTB</li>
	<li>Check POD status</li>
	<li>Check last billing invoice amount</li>
</ul>

<h3>Handling</h3>

<ul>
	<li>Check POD/Invoice status &amp; guide customer as IT teams response</li>
	<li>Incase customer is satisfied, disconnect&nbsp;the call</li>
	<li>For all cases where duplicate bill is required by customer , We will politely guide customer to get the bill from WHATSAPP service *(03003008000) &amp; USSD *8812#</li>
	<li>Request will be launched in eFfront incase customer is a non-smartphone user and specifically mentions that he cannot use WHATSAPP or *8812#
	<ul>
		<li>
		<p>We will guide customer for Self Service as first priority, In which case no activity will be created. In case customer is a non-smartphone user or does not want to use recommended mediums, we will create request in eFront&nbsp; as per normal process</p>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Duplicate Bill is available through USSD Code *8812#.</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Through registered mobile number customer will dial USSD String *8812# code to get duplicate bill of past 6 months.</li>
	<li>Customer will reply in numeric value for respective month as per requirement of Duplicate bill.</li>
	<li>Only past 6-month duplicate bills can be requested through this USSD.</li>
	<li>After entering the required month through USSD customer will receive SMS with URL to download his duplicate bill. As soon as customer clicks the URL Data charges will apply.</li>
	<li>Incase Duplicate Bill is not available, customer will get intimation SMS.</li>
	<li>Only Jazz Postpaid consumer &amp; business customers can get duplicate bill from this USSD</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Process at eCare/Jazz World App</strong></p>

<p>Bill Feature is available for Jazz Individual Postpaid Consumers since launch and should be guided to customers for better customer experience and empowerment.</p>

<p>Kindly follow steps as given below:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Login <strong>&ldquo;Jazz World App&rdquo;</strong></li>
	<li>Click on<strong> &ldquo;Tap to pay bill&rdquo; </strong></li>
	<li>Click on &ldquo;<strong>Download&rdquo;</strong></li>
	<li>Bill will be displayed.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong><strong> </strong>This feature is not available for Employee family &amp; Employee number/ Warid Postpaid/B2B users</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>With reference to Duplicate Bill Requests received at any CC-Channel, billing invoice (PDF) will be sent only at registered email address of the customer, updated in CRM. No other email address will be entertained for sharing personal / invoice details.</li>
	<li>For all complaints or requests where customer demands Duplicate Bill, we need to follow below guidelines:</li>
	<li>Billing invoice should only be shared to;
	<ul>
		<li>Email address which is mentioned in the CRM (Siebel)</li>
		<li>Customer WhatsApp number, If the request comes from same CLI or email address registered against the owner in CRM</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Note: In case customer has lost the login ID/password of the email address mentioned in CRM and ask to send duplicate bill on another email address, we will inform customer to update new email address in CRM first after taking L3 verification over Call/Email/Experience Center as per existing SOP for Change in Invoice Profile. Once change in email address submitted, only then we will process Duplicate Bill on updated email ID.</li>
	<li>All failed/cancelled state DB activities in efront will be handled by Customer Operations High Value Team for resolution/completion mentioning proper notes in activity followed by ISMS &amp; call back if required. TAT in thsi case will be 4 Hours</li>
</ul>

<h2>Duplicate Bill through USSD</h2>

<ul>
	<li>USSD code will not be dial able from Prepaid Jazz number.</li>
	<li>There will be no charges for duplicate bill however data charges may apply upon downloading bill from URL.</li>
	<li>USSD (*8812#) short Code is free of cost</li>
	<li>OG blocked number can also dial this USSD code however in order to access the URL received over the SMS, customer would be required to have Data services.</li>
	<li>Menu is static and it will give the option of past six months irrespective of tenure of the number.</li>
	<li>Postpaid Port Out Customer will not be able to dial JAZZ USSD code</li>
	<li>If customer has feature phone, duplicate bill URL received over the SMS can be copied and accessed through web browser.</li>
	<li>URL is not password protected.</li>
	<li>Once the link is clicked it will expire. Incase customer wants to get &lsquo;Duplicate Bill&rsquo; again customer needs to dial the code again</li>
	<li>There is no system visibility or tracking available for this USSD against any particular number</li>
	<li>There is no restriction of max attempts against any particular number for this USSD.</li>
	<li>Duplicate Bill cannot be retrieved for the current month.</li>
	<li>Once USSD is dialed, URL is received over the sms 2-3mins Time delay.</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 3315

	<li>SR will be created incase customer is a non-smartphone user and specifically mentions that he cannot use WHATSAPP or *8812#
	<ul>
		<li>
		<p>We will guide customer for Self Service as first priority, In which case no SR will be created for backend. In case customer is a non-smartphone user or does not want to use recommended mediums, we will create SR as per normal process</p>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<h2>Duplicate Bill is available through USSD Code *8812#.</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Through registered mobile number customer will dial USSD String *8812# code to get duplicate bill of past 6 months.</li>
	<li>Customer will reply in numeric value for respective month as per requirement of Duplicate bill.</li>
	<li>Only past 6-month duplicate bills can be requested through this USSD.</li>
	<li>After entering the required month through USSD customer will receive SMS with URL to download his duplicate bill. As soon as customer clicks the URL Data charges will apply.</li>
	<li>Incase Duplicate Bill is not available, customer will get intimation SMS.</li>
	<li>Only Jazz Postpaid consumer &amp; business customers can get duplicate bill from this USSD</li>
</ul>

<h2>Process at eCare/Jazz World App</h2>

<p>Bill Feature is available for Jazz Individual Postpaid Consumers since launch and should be guided to customers for better customer experience and empowerment.</p>

<p>Kindly follow steps as given below:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Login <strong>&ldquo;Jazz World App&rdquo;</strong></li>
	<li>Click on<strong> &ldquo;Tap to pay bill&rdquo; </strong></li>
	<li>Click on &ldquo;<strong>Download&rdquo;</strong></li>
	<li>Bill will be displayed.</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Note:</strong><strong> </strong>This feature is not available for Employee family &amp; Employee number/ Warid Postpaid/B2B users</p>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul style="margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px">
	<li>No Bill Not Received Complaint even if customer complaining that he has not received his bill, make Bill Not Received task by mentioning proper notes and email address</li>
	<li>E bill: CSR will ask the billing month for which the bill was not received. If it&rsquo;s the current month then check whether 7 days have passed since invoice date.</li>
	<li>If not, then inform customer that he would be receiving the bill at any time within these 7 days. (Bill reaches to customer within 7 days of invoice generation</li>
	<li>Verify customer&rsquo;s present email address, if customer could not get bill due to wrong Email address then the correct/new email address in
	<ul>
		<li>TCS CUSTOMER SERVICES &rarr; ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT VIEW / UPDATE CONTRACT</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Franchise will make task</li>
	<li>In case the address is same, CSR will check Bill delivery status from POD Status link available at CS Portal &rarr; CS Systems &rarr; POD Status.</li>
	<li>CSR will inform the customer about the Bill status mentioned as per POD status</li>
	<li>If bill status is not available then CSR will make task of &ldquo;Duplicate Bill&rdquo; and mention the correct email address also</li>
	<li>Note:
	<ul>
		<li>POD is not available at Franchise, so that can confirm the same from 124/franchise coordinator.</li>
		<li>E Bill not received task can be made for last 3 Months only.</li>
		<li>If POD status is not available even after 10 days of bill run then kindly create E Bill Not Received Task.</li>
		<li>It is mandatory to verify Invoices before forwarding Bill Not Received Task.</li>
		<li>E-bill, with &amp; without itemized billing, will be sent to customers even if amount is less than Rs 200.</li>
		<li>&nbsp;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

	<ul>
		<li>Type of SR: Cellular Complaint</li>
		<li>Area: Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Area: Insufficient Balance</li>
		<li>Sub Type: (As per Complaint)</li>
	</ul>

	<li>Error Message: Insufficient Error despite of having balance</li>

	<ul>
		<li>If ON: Guide customer to turn-off data sessions and then try again.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <p>System Checks for Network Operational Complaints:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Check HLR</li>
	<li>Static Map Check</li>
	<li>Mobi-Live Check</li>
	<li>Check ADM</li>
	<li>SmartCare Portal</li>
	<li>CCMS Portal</li>
	<li>ICS Portal</li>
	<li>eFront (NTT and OMT Tab)</li>
	<li>Check Google Earth for finding customer location</li>
	<li>Call customer within 2 hours after checking the above mentioned systems</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Mandatory Alternate: We need to guide alternate turn off data for 3 minutes and wait until the Data sign disappeared from screen and then turn on the Data to get rid of the said issue and guide for the future prospective as well or restart the handset and try again.</li>
	<li>If the customer is complaining about the difference of balance (*111# and 123 IVR and as per Siebel it&rsquo;s different), no message confirmation is required in this case. We need to mention the exact difference in balance. The alternate remedy will be Hard Reset/restart handset and will forward an immediate complaint about all segments</li>
	<li>No complaint will be acknowledged in insufficient balance compliant<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active

			</td>

			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">work code: pertaining to customer query</span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:none; border-left:none; border-right:none; border-top:none; height:115px; width:0px">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:.2in; width:205px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">TAT:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black"> No timeline </span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:none; border-left:none; border-right:none; border-top:none; height:24px; width:0px">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

Required Questions: <ul style="margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px">
	<li>While catering QOS complaint for prepaid numbers, below process needs to be followed</li>
	<li>Sir, Aap ne jo akhri call 0300/0321/ etc. pay ki thi us main XYZ issue aaraha tha ?</li>
	<li>If multiple issues updated on NTT for same cell ID then we need to probe for City</li>
	<li>If No, will ask for time, duration &amp; prefix etc. to identify the exact Cell ID and paste in NTT (Efront) to check known issues</li>
	<li>If any open ticket is there only then probe location and area. No need to ask Exact Address or Handset</li>
	<li>For Postpaid we will probe for customer&lsquo;s location and check in NTT. No need to ask for exact location, land marks and nearest places</li>
	<li>Along with launching complaint/guiding known issue, we also need to guide customer to check with different handset too</li>
	<li>If Yes, copy last 14 digits of Country Network Code and paste in NTT (Efront) to check known issues</li>
	<li>If No open ticket in NTT, paste 14 digit cell ID in customer area field &amp; city name. Moreover leave Handset field blank in SR and process further</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If NTT shows Jammers in the Area then we need to inform customer that there are Jammers installed in the area and customer may face network issue at this location</li>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>If customer is unable call on all numbers OR any particular number and getting Network related message, like &lsquo;Network Busy, Call Failed, Call end without any message&rsquo; etc. We will process QoS related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>Handling for network issues like Signal, Call Drop, Call Connectivity issues etc. faced due to Power Failure issues only:
	<ul>
		<li>As per our current practice ; after probing if we identified that issue is due to power failure only (network issue is faced only during WAPDA outage) then we will inform customer (all segments) upfront that issue is being faced due to prolonged power failure and will be resolved when overall situation gets better.&nbsp;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>We will not make self-completed Signal Related SR instead we will make entry in NTT page against Power failure Work Codes in KNOWN TICKETS and/ or NETWORK TICKETS as per customer complaint.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>In case customer faces issue like call congestion or call drop etc. during power failure only, then also we will make entry against power failure</li>
	<li>Exceptions can be forwarded to team leaders. Team Leaders can process Power Failure complaints for such cases and they need to send email to relevant NCU Team as well along with processing SR only in exceptional cases.</li>
	<li>We will not make escalation activities on already created/ completed activities and handle customers, as per above mentioned guidelines.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>If NTT is open, we need to punch NTT as we are not forwarding any complaint in this scenario</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>NOTE:</strong> No complaint will be entertained for indoor issues which is being faced for more than 15 days</span></span></li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 3391

	</li>

	</li>

	<ul>

		<li>Area: Postpaid/Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Area: Incoming Calls</li>
		<li>Sub Type: (As per Complaint)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

	<li>Confirm if diverts are active on Party B; then should communicate code ##002# prior forwarding complaint</li>
	<li>Probe for exact issue (error message)</li>
	<li>Known Issue on NTT page in eFront</li>
</ul>

<p>For prepaid numbers, below process needs to be followed</p>

<ul>
	<li>Sir, Aap ne jo akhri call 0300/0321/ etc. pay ki thi us main XYZ issue aaraha tha ?
	<ul>
		<li>If multiple issues updated on NTT for same cell ID then we need to probe for City</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>If No, will ask for time, duration &amp; prefix etc. to identify the exact Cell ID and paste in NTT (Efront) to check known issues
	<ul>
		<li>If any open ticket is there only then probe location and area. No need to ask Exact Address or Handset</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Along with launching complaint/guiding known issue, we also need to guide customer to check with different handset too</li>
	<li>Country Code feature functioning
	<ul>

		<li><strong>Step 3</strong>: If there is <strong>Open </strong>trouble ticket in NTT then agent will not acknowledge the complaints and will guide customer as per normal SOP <strong>(Punching of work code is mandatory in this case)</strong></li>
		<li><strong>Step 4: </strong>If there is closed ticket then agent will pick<strong> Site Code </strong>from NTT and will search this site code from Static Map</li>
		<li><strong>Step 5:</strong> Check Static Map coverage:</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:.2in; width:205px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">TAT :</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black"> NO timeline</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:none; border-left:none; border-right:none; border-top:none; height:24px; width:0px">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td rowspan="2" style="background-color:#7d3c00; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:74px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">&nbsp;BROWN</span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td rowspan="2" style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:74px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">Low Indoor/Outdoor Coverage Area</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black"> - Invalid for both Indoor/outdoor Complaints</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:74px; width:205px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">CCR will not entertain complaint, but will only log work code in efront as per existing process, CCR will politely guide customer about low coverage in that area informing that we are trying to extend coverage as soon as possible &nbsp;</span></span></span></span></p>

			</td>
			<td rowspan="2" style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:92px; width:198px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">work code: pertaining to customer query</span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:none; border-left:none; border-right:none; border-top:none; height:115px; width:0px">&nbsp;</td>

		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:.2in; width:205px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">TAT:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black"> No timeline </span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:none; border-left:none; border-right:none; border-top:none; height:24px; width:0px">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

Required Questions: <p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="line-height:107%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</span></span></span></p>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Where Country Code in Siebel or cell site against ALOC is not available in NTT then agent will probe for customer location and consult NTT</li>
	<li><em>For Postpaid customers we can take country code from Data tickets in Siebel CDR&rsquo;s and follow above steps and for other complaints you can directly ask the location, then verify the coverage status from NTT/Static Map</em></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3rd Floor</li>
	<li>For HV we acknowledge compliant immediately where as in LV we ask customer about temporary issue advised to check after 2 hours, in case more than 2 hours we should lunch the complaint.</li>
	<li>If NTT shows Jammers in the Area then we need to inform customer that there are Jammers installed in the area and customer may face network issue at this location</li>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>For number busy error on incoming calls(Party B), activation of ICS should be checked. In case ICS is active we will guide customer to change screening mode (Blacklist). If ICS is not active then guide customer that it is handset related feature</li>
	<li>For diverts cancellation, we need to guide ##002# along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than PCO/Dongle Service Class)</li>
	<li>Dongle Service Class is voice barred; we will not acknowledge incoming/outgoing complaint</li>
	<li>IVR (short codes) connectivity related issues (except 230) will be catered as Operational complaint (coverage is mandatory)</li>
	<li>0900 numbers are not dial able from mobile. No complaint will be launched in this case</li>
	<li>If customer is unable call on all numbers OR any particular number and getting Network related message, like &lsquo;Network Busy, Call Failed, Call end without any message&rsquo; etc. We will process QoS</li>
	<li>related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>For barring cancellation, we need to guide #33*0000# code along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than Dongle Service Class). This code is disabled now</li>
	<li>Sub Type PTCL will be used for connectivity issue on short codes (like 1217, 1218, 1122, 115, 117 etc.) and all UAN numbers</li>
	<li>Handset related issues: Call Not Allowed - Fixed dialing, Check Operator Service - Send My Caller ID is set No</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 4459

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: I-Roam Outbound Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Both
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer is facing Outgoing Network Complaints while on roaming then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 3068
Point of Contact: Network Complaint Unit
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check IR tariff sheet for collaboration confirmation</li>
	<li>umber should be active</li>
	<li>Check HLR for IR and other Parameter issues and launched OMT activity if issue found</li>
	<li>Status of Party B (Jazz number) if calling to Pakistan</li>
	<li>Probe for exact issue (error message) and problem Faced by the customer&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Known Issue on NTT page in eFront for local issues in Pakistan if any</li>
	<li>Country visiting (check partnership from IR Tariff Sheet)</li>
	<li>Name of operator selected&nbsp;</li>
	<li>For Data Roaming Complaints, please get below settings verified on customer&rsquo;s handset and confirm.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>APN should be connect.mobilinkworld.com (for this go to settings &rarr; more &rarr; mobile networks &rarr;access point name &rarr; jazz )</li>
	<li>Data roaming should be ON.</li>
	<li>Data connectivity should be ON.</li>
	<li>Set Name and Model&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Other Contact Number</li>
	<li>Duration</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">On activating IR with Data services, guide customers to enable following services from Network/Mobile/Cellular settings if customer is facing issue in using data services while on roaming</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Mobile Data</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Data Roaming</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Turn Off Wifi</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Guide customer to check APN in Mobile Data settings and update APN as <span style="color:red">&ldquo;</span>jazz<span style="color:red">&rdquo; </span>(lower case) to use uninterrupted data services on roaming</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If required, send APN settings from ADM/ISMS and guide customer accordingly</span></span></li>
		<li><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Note:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"> Same handling to be followed where IR with Data already active and customer inquire about IR with Data services status/details. <span style="color:black">Warid Business customers have their own separate APNs</span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>We only commit call back. Please do not commit that issue will be resolved in 2 hours</li>
	<li>We need not to refuse complaint if any of the information required in the probing checklist is not available upon probing such as Country/operator name (both inbound &amp; outbound), SIM number (Inbound)</li>
	<li>Where contact number is not provided by customer then after launching complaint we need to guide customer to call back after 2 hours to check status of his/her complaint</li>
	<li>Incase Jazz customer is facing data connectivity issue while on international roaming then same complaint will be launched</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>For number busy error on incoming calls(Party B), activation of ICS should be checked. In case ICS is active we will guide customer to change screening mode (Blacklist). If ICS is not active then guide customer that it is handset related feature</li>
	<li>For diverts cancellation, we need to guide ##002# along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than PCO/Dongle Service Class)</li>
	<li>IVR (short codes) connectivity related issues (except 230) will be catered as Operational complaint (coverage is mandatory)</li>
	<li>0900 numbers are not dial able from mobile. No complaint will be launched in this case</li>
	<li>For Network busy related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>For barring cancellation, we need to guide #33*0000# code along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than Dongle Service Class). This code is disabled now</li>
	<li>Handset related issues: Call Not Allowed - Fixed dialing, Check Operator Service - Send My Caller ID is set No</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: SMS Outgoing-Delete
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer complains for SMS Outgoing issue then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 1050,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 3068
Point of Contact: Network Complaint Unit
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Launch below SR in Siebel:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Type of SR: Cellular Complaint (smart script)</li>
	<li>Area: Postpaid/Prepaid</li>
	<li>Sub Area: Outgoing SMS</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Known Issue NTT</li>
	<li>Account Balance</li>
	<li>Confirm if Party B is receiving SMS from all other numbers</li>
	<li>Duration</li>
	<li>Error</li>
	<li>Number should be active</li>
	<li>Probe for exact issue (error message)</li>
	<li>Known Issue on NTT page in eFront
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><strong>T</strong>ake the <strong><em>Country Code</em></strong> from CDR (Siebel)</li>
		<li><strong>Step 2</strong>: Agent will search this particular country code from <strong><em>NTT page</em></strong></li>
		<li><strong>Step 3</strong>: If there is <strong>Open </strong>trouble ticket in NTT then agent will not acknowledge the complaints and will guide customer as per normal SOP <strong>(Punching of work code is mandatory in this case)</strong></li>
		<li><strong>Step 4: </strong>If there is closed ticket then agent will pick<strong> Site Code </strong>from NTT and will search this site code from Static Map</li>
		<li><strong>Step 5:</strong> Check Static Map coverage:</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:#e7e6e6; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid #bfbfbf; border-right:1px solid #bfbfbf; border-top:none; height:191px; vertical-align:top; width:1048px">
			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">For complaints where customer claims&nbsp; that they are successfully sending SMS but SMS is not received party B end. </span></span></span></p>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="color:black">Scenario 1: </span></u></strong></span></span></p>

			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">It has been observed that when customers are using American handsets and after updating of software, it adds <strong>11</strong> before number. In this case SMS is successfully sent (also visible in CDR&rsquo;s ) but not received at&nbsp; party B end.</span></span></span></li>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer confirms&nbsp; such a case where customer&rsquo;s handset is appending &ldquo;11&rdquo; as prefix, ask customer to check if &ldquo;11&rdquo; is being appended only when customer sends message to B-Party who&rsquo;s number is saved in his/her contact list or when he/she manually types the B-Party number for SMS. </span></span></span></li>
			</ul>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="color:black">Remedy:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If error is true where customer is sending message to saved list then guide customer to re-build his/her contact list . </span></span></span></li>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Second remedy is to ask customer to factory reset handset or downgrade its software for issue resolution.</span></span></span></li>
			</ul>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style="color:#1f497d"> <em>&nbsp;</em></span><em><span style="color:black">Important: &ldquo;Please ensure that re-building of contact list is always guided before asking customer to downgrade handsets Software</span></em><span style="color:black">&rdquo;. </span></span></span></p>

			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Common Example of American handsets are; </span></span></span></li>
			</ul>

			<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Motorola XT1585/Motorola Droid Turbo 2,</span> <span style="color:black">Motorola KF12937145/Motorola XT1662/Motorola Moto M,</span> <span style="color:black">Motorola XT1254/Motorola XT1250 etc)&nbsp; </span></span></span></p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><img alt="cid:image006.jpg@01D56F0A.DEA689F0" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," style="height:48px; width:711px" /></strong></span></span></p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:#e7e6e6; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid #bfbfbf; border-right:1px solid #bfbfbf; border-top:none; height:160px; vertical-align:top; width:1048px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Scenario 2: </u></strong></span></span></p>

			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case customer claims sending SMS but it&rsquo;s not received at party B end,&nbsp; there is a possibility of improper <strong><em>Service Center</em></strong><em> <strong>Number</strong></em> saved in customer&rsquo;s handset;&nbsp; this error can be modified after software/firmware upgrade.</span></span></span></li>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">However, in case where <strong><em>Service Center</em></strong><em> <strong>Number </strong></em>is not properly saved<strong><em>, </em></strong>It is observed that there will be no record/CDR&nbsp; generated due to invalid SC-number where no message is submitted to SMSC.</span></span></span></li>
			</ul>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="color:black">Remedy:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In this case please guide customer to modify the <strong><em>Service Center Number</em></strong> to <strong>&ldquo;92300000042&rdquo; </strong>or simply<strong> &ldquo;<span style="background-color:aqua">92300&rdquo;</span></strong> by checking through the settings of its default messaging App in handset.</span></span></span></li>
			</ul>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:#e7e6e6; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid #bfbfbf; border-right:1px solid #bfbfbf; border-top:none; height:191px; vertical-align:top; width:1048px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Scenario 3: </u></strong></span></span></p>

			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">There are situations where outgoing SMS issue is related to <strong>Anti-spamming </strong>policy which can be handled upfront by frontend agents with proper probing.</span></span></span></li>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">It has been observed that customers are complaining about outgoing SMS issue, when customers are sending same text/content on different numbers which exceeds allowed Limits on Jazz network. <em>Example: &nbsp;&ldquo;Good Morning&rdquo; send to 400 contacts in 15 mins, this is spamming.</em></span></span></span></li>
			</ul>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="color:black">Remedy:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer message exceed the limit, message will reject by anti-spam.</span></span></span></li>
			</ul>

			<p style="margin-left:48px">&nbsp;</p>

			<table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse">
				<tbody>
					<tr>
						<td style="background-color:#c00000; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; height:13px; vertical-align:top; width:230px">
						<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:white">Number of Messages</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Important Guidelines:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Where Country Code in Siebel or cell site against ALOC is not available in NTT then agent will probe for customer location and consult NTT</li>
	<li><em>For Postpaid customers we can take country code from Data tickets in Siebel CDR&rsquo;s and follow above steps and for other complaints you can directly ask the location, then verify the coverage status from NTT/Static Map</em></li>
	<li>We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3rd Floor</li>
	<li>Duration of complaint</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul style="margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px">
	<li>Number of B Party:</li>
	<li>Duration of Complaint</li>
	<li>City</li>
	<li>Error Message (Sending failed/Unable to send, Messages are sent but not received on a number: Confirm if Party B is receiving SMS from all other numbers)</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Check if Services are active in Siebel &amp; in HLR and will launch activity under OMT Tab in eFront as per below scenario:
	<ul>
		<li>For Barring issue we will make &ldquo;SMS barring&rdquo; activity</li>
		<li>For SMS Parameter missing issue &ldquo;SMS Reset&rdquo; activity</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Check NTT if there is any known issue</li>
	<li>Check for ICS service on party B numnber
	<ul>
		<li>Buffer SMS complaint will be catered on immediate basis &amp; Irrespective of coverage area with complete note pad details</li>
		<li>We do not commit SMS on GO CDMA, PTCL, V wireless numbers</li>
		<li>We will not take complaint if customer reports any delay issue of sending/receiving SMS</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Buffer SMS complaint will be catered on immediate basis &amp; Irrespective of coverage area with clear notepad details</li>
	<li>In case customer is receiving error of Check Operator Services on outgoing SMS, we will guide voice barring code alongwith forward following activity in OMT TAB (E-front), instead of creating outgoing SMS</li>
	<li>In case an SMS outgoing/Incoming complaint for all number (with no error prompt received and message stuck in outbox) is received from customer using any handset then we need to guide customer that he is facing issue due to handset and guide below reasons and remedies.
	<ul>
		<li>Delete previous messages from inbox, sent items, drafts, outbox</li>
		<li>Do a Handset Restart of cell phone</li>
		<li>Guide for SMS settings as well</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>If all above remedies do not work, then ask customer to change handset as well</li>
	<li>We will forward normal SMS outgoing complaints incase customer is facing SMS outgoing issue on Geo Alerts/designated VAS shortcodes</li>
	<li>We do not commit SMS on GO CDMA, PTCL, V wireless numbers</li>
	<li>We will not take complaint if customer reports any delay issue of sending/receiving SMS</li>
	<li>Any SMS exceeding 480 characters (3+ SMS length) may be converted into an MMS in some of the handsets available in market (mostly smartphones). This may result in;</li>
	<li>Charging according to MMS package</li>
	<li>Sending failure if MMS service is not enabled on sender end</li>
	<li>No delivery of MMS on non-compatible handsets on receiver end</li>
	<li>Check if Services are active in in HLR and will launch activity under OMT Tab in eFront as per below scenario</li>
	<li>For Barring issue we will make &ldquo;SMS barring&rdquo; activity
	<ul>
		<li>For SMS Parameter missing issue &ldquo;SMS Reset&rdquo; activity</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Check NTT if there is any known issue</li>
	<li>Check Current Balance if sufficient to make Outgoing SMS</li>
	<li>Buffer SMS complaint will be catered on immediate basis &amp; Irrespective of coverage area with clear notepad details</li>
	<li>We will not take complaint if customer reports any delay issue of sending/receiving SMS</li>
	<li>SMS delivery time for switched off number is 4 Hours and for MCA notification SMS maximum validity is 48 hours</li>
	<li>For Check Operator Services on outgoing SMS, we will guide voice barring code along with forwarding SMS Barring - Prepaid activity in eFront - OMT TAB (TAT: 2 hours)</li>
	<li>For SMS outgoing/Incoming complaint with no error prompt received and message stuck in outbox, we need to guide customer to delete messages from inbox, sent items, drafts, outbox. Check SMS settings and restart handset. Customer can check with other handset as well</li>
	<li>Any SMS exceeding 480 characters (3+ SMS length) may be converted into MMS in some of the handsets available in market (mostly smartphones). This may result in: Charging according to MMS, sending failure if MMS service is not enabled on sender end, No delivery of MMS on non-compatible handsets on receiver end</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

<p><strong>Important Guidelines:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Where Country Code in Siebel or cell site against ALOC is not available in NTT then agent will probe for customer location and consult NTT</li>
	<li><em>For Postpaid customers we can take country code from Data tickets in Siebel CDR&rsquo;s and follow above steps and for othr complaints you can directly ask the location, then verify the coverage status from NTT/Static Map</em></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3rd Floor</li>
	<li>Duration of complaint</li>
</ul>

	<li>ISD Number:&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Error Message&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Duration of Complaint&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Other contact number</li>
</ul>

	<li>Sub Area: Incoming Calls</li>
	<li>Sub Type: Incoming OMO</li>
	<li>Mention ISD Incoming</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: ISD Outgoing
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer is facing international outgoing complaint then we will follow these guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint

Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

<ul>
	<li>Type of SR: Cellular Complaint</li>
	<li>Area: Postpaid/Prepaid</li>
	<li>Sub Area: Outgoing Calls</li>
	<li>Sub Type: ISD Outgoing</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Number should be active</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Probe for diverts and check HLR. Launch eFront activity if issue found with HLR parameters</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Probe for exact issue (error message)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">No ISD barring at customer&rsquo;s number&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">In Case of Postpaid Customer having ISD access&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Dial ISD number with 00 instead of &rdquo;+&rdquo;&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Omit 0 after ISD code in the number&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Account Balance (Prepaid)&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Error received</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Status of Party A (Mobilink number)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Confirm if diverts are active then should communicate code ##002# prior forwarding complaint</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Probe for exact issue (error message)</span></span></span></span></span></li>

		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">T</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">ake the&nbsp;<strong><em>Country Code</em></strong>&nbsp;from CDR (Siebel)</span></span></span></span></span></li>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</span></span></span></span></span></li>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Important Guidelines:</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Where Country Code in Siebel or cell site against ALOC is not available in NTT then agent will probe for customer location and consult NTT</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><em><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">For Postpaid customers we can take country code from Data tickets in Siebel CDR&rsquo;s and follow above steps and for othr complaints you can directly ask the location, then verify the coverage status from NTT/Static Map</span></span></em></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3rd Floor</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Duration of complaint</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>ISD Number:&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Error Message&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Duration of Complaint&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Other contact number</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If NTT shows Jammers in the Area then we need to inform customer that there are Jammers installed in the area and customer may face network issue at this location</li>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>Dongle Service Class is voice barred; we will not acknowledge incoming/outgoing complaint</li>
	<li>If customer is unable call on all numbers OR any particular number and getting Network related message, like &lsquo;Network Busy, Call Failed, Call end without any message&rsquo; etc. We will process QoS related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>Handset related issues: Call Not Allowed - Fixed dialing, Check Operator Service - Send My Caller ID is set No</li>
	<li>Same complaint will be processed for QoS complaints (i.e. No audio/Audio loop back, Echo or call drop) on ISD calls only</li>
	<li>For Insufficient balance issue on ISD calls; we will forward Insufficient balance complaint&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Guide customer not to call back the ISD number from receiving list. Dial the number by punching on keypad</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

	<tbody>
		<tr>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Where Country Code in Siebel or cell site against ALOC is not available in NTT then agent will probe for customer location and consult NTT</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><em><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">For Postpaid customers we can take country code from Data tickets in Siebel CDR&rsquo;s and follow above steps and for other complaints you can directly ask the location, then verify the coverage status from NTT/Static Map</span></span></em></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3rd Floor</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>PTCL Number with Area Code</li>
	<li>Error Message by PTC Customer</li>
	<li>Duration of Complaint&nbsp;</li>
	<li>City (Exact Location of Jazz Customer)</li>
	<li>Other contact number&nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If NTT shows Jammers in the Area then we need to inform customer that there are Jammers installed in the area and customer may face network issue at this location</li>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>For number busy error on incoming calls(Party B), activation of ICS should be checked. In case ICS is active we will guide customer to change screening mode (Blacklist). If ICS is not active then guide customer that it is handset related feature</li>
	<li>For diverts cancellation, we need to guide ##002# along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than PCO/Dongle Service Class)</li>
	<li>Dongle Service Class is voice barred; we will not acknowledge incoming/outgoing complaint</li>
	<li>IVR (short codes) connectivity related issues (except 230) will be catered as Operational complaint (coverage is mandatory)</li>
	<li>0900 numbers are not dial able from mobile. No complaint will be launched in this case</li>
	<li>If customer is unable call on all numbers OR any particular number and getting Network related message, like &lsquo;Network Busy, Call Failed, Call end without any message&rsquo; etc. We will process QoS</li>
	<li>related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>For barring cancellation, we need to guide #33*0000# code along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than Dongle Service Class). This code is disabled now</li>
	<li>Sub Type PTCL will be used for connectivity issue on short codes (like 1217, 1218, 1122, 115, 117 etc.) and all UAN numbers</li>
	<li>Handset related issues: Call Not Allowed - Fixed dialing, Check Operator Service - Send My Caller ID is set No</li>
	<li>We don&rsquo;t make complaints for congestion / busy tone in case of PTCL incoming complaint</li>
	<li>Note that where any NCU related SR is completed &amp; customer complains for the same issue again after 15 days then we will forward fresh SR with required details instead of making escalation activity.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Escalation activity against such issues will only be forwarded if the related SR is less than 15 days old.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Completion time will be checked in SR from &ldquo;Closed on&rdquo; Date.</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 5629

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: PTCL Outgoing Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer is facing PTCL Outgoing Network Complaints then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 1050,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 3068
Point of Contact: TEC Team
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Agent will launch below SR in Siebel</p>

<ul>
	<li>Type of SR: Cellular Complaint (smart script)</li>
	<li>Area: Postpaid/Prepaid</li>
	<li>Sub Area: Outgoing Calls</li>
	<li>Sub Type: (As per Complaint)</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Jazz Number should be active</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Digit &ldquo;3&rdquo; needs to be added in all existing 7 digits numbers of Karachi and Lahore</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Digit &ldquo;9&rdquo; should be added in all existing numbers starting from &ldquo;9&rdquo;</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Account Balance</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Status of Party B (PTCL number) Confirm if Party B is dial-able from all other numbers</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Probe for exact issue (error message) and Duration of Error receive</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Known Issue on NTT page in eFront</span></span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">T</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">ake the <strong><em>Country Code</em></strong> from CDR (Siebel)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Step 2</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">: Agent will search this particular country code from <strong><em>NTT page</em></strong></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Step 3</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">: If there is <strong>Open </strong>trouble ticket in NTT then agent will not acknowledge the complaints and will guide customer as per normal SOP <strong>(Punching of work code is mandatory in this case)</strong></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Step 4: </span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">If there is closed ticket then agent will pick<strong> Site Code </strong>from NTT and will search this site code from Static Map</span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Step 5:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"> Check Static Map coverage:</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Where Country Code in Siebel or cell site against ALOC is not available in NTT then agent will probe for customer location and consult NTT</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">For Postpaid customers we can take country code from Data tickets in Siebel CDR&rsquo;s and follow above steps and for other complaints you can directly ask the location, then verify the coverage status from NTT/Static Map</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3rd Floor</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li>PTC Number:</li>
	<li>Error Message</li>
	<li>Duration of Complaint:</li>
	<li>City</li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If NTT shows Jammers in the Area then we need to inform customer that there are Jammers installed in the area and customer may face network issue at this location</li>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>For number busy error on incoming calls(Party B), activation of ICS should be checked. In case ICS is active we will guide customer to change screening mode (Blacklist). If ICS is not active then guide customer that it is handset related feature</li>
	<li>For diverts cancellation, we need to guide ##002# along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than PCO/Dongle Service Class)</li>
	<li>Dongle Service Class is voice barred; we will not acknowledge incoming/outgoing complaint</li>
	<li>0900 numbers are not dial able from mobile. No complaint will be launched in this case</li>
	<li>If customer is unable call on all numbers OR any particular number and getting Network related message, like &lsquo;Network Busy, Call Failed, Call end without any message&rsquo; etc. We will process QoS</li>
	<li>related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>For barring cancellation, we need to guide #33*0000# code along with processing activity in eFront OMT Tab (other than Dongle Service Class). This code is disabled now</li>
	<li>Sub Type PTCL will be used for connectivity issue on short codes (like 1217, 1218, 1122, 115, 117 etc.) and all UAN numbers</li>
	<li>Handset related issues: Call Not Allowed - Fixed dialing, Check Operator Service - Send My Caller ID is set No</li>
	<li>In case of short code dialing issue we will forward the complaint in PTCL Outgoing head by mentioning &ldquo;short code dialing issue&rdquo; in Summary Field and will mention the short code i.e. 1122, 115, 117 etc. in Detail Description&nbsp;</li>
	<li>We are still not offering connectivity with &ldquo;Internet Calling Cards, SCOM, ARMY Exchange and TELECARD Wireless.</li>
	<li>1217 and 1218 connectivity complaints will be forwarded under same head</li>
	<li>All UAN number&#39;s connectivity complaint will be catered in the same header.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>We do not commit connectivity with PTCL helpline 1236. Please handle customers accordingly005</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Internet Settings Handling Update(delete)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer is facing GPRS settings issue then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 18,1063
Point of Contact: Respective Team Leader
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Step1: Agent will check ADM for handset detection time (date and time will be probed)<br />
Step 2: Check CDRs for data usage after handset detection</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">1.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;If usage shown&rarr;Agent will treat the complaint as browsing complaint and guide customer accordingly<br />
2.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;If usage not shown&rarr; Agent will check ADM history from &ldquo;Show History&rdquo; tab in ADM and probe status of the last settings sent&nbsp;</p>

<p>Step3: Agent will then ask customer if he saved the settings or not</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">1.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;If settings were saved&rarr; Agent will then probe for the actual issue. Agent will also check the below&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Data Sign&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Standard APN</li>
	<li>SIM in slot 1</li>
	<li>SIM management for data usage</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:40px">2.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;If settings were not saved and usage is not shown&rarr;Agent will ask if any changes in APN settings were made&rarr; If changes are made Agent will guide customer the Standard APN and have it updated</p>

<p>Step4: In case still setting are required and auto settings available in ADM then the Agent will follow below HV &amp; Mass handling</p>

<p>Step5: If customer is unable to receive settings via ADM then move to below step of manual settings instead of sending the settings or guiding code again</p>

<p>Step6: Standard APN where Manual Settings are Required: Generic APN (any alphabet) for handset settings should not be guided where manual settings are required and we need to educate customers about Standard APN for all cases where manual settings are required however we can guide the customer as per below mentioned suggested statement where customer is unable to perform manual settings.</p>

<p>Standard Statement: Moaziz Sarif, Bahtar internet speed hasil karny kay liye Mobile Network option main ja kar Access Point Name settings ko RESET TO DEFAULT kar lain. Shukria</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Handset should be compatible</li>
	<li>Check the ADM history</li>
	<li>Check the CRM for GPRS activation status it should be active</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If Mass customers are unable to do manual settings then we should route customers to visit nearest Jazz office as per current practice</li>
	<li>If HV customer is unable to do manual settings then escalate the case to TL for manual settings as per existing handling</li>
	<li>We need to educate customers about below mentioned Standard APN for all cases where manual settings are required</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Data Complaints Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Below complaint handing need to be followed if customer contacts us for Data browsing related complaints</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 18
