Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">While handling data complaints first we need to categorize the issue as mentioned below then need to proceed further as per check list</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Customer Fail to Access Internet</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Customer is facing No Browsing/Slow Browsing/Streaming issue</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Data provisioning (verify from CRM and HLR) &amp; also check parameters&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Data Barring not active</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Handset settings / APN should be verified</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">SGSN shown</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Data Blocking (for postpaid only)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Network Mode is Auto</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Jazz SIM should be selected from sim card manager option as default on data</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Coverage from static MAP solution</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">All type of data complaints should be catered through Static Map and SSO Portal</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">ADM should be checked for all type of data complaints</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Sequence Probing as per issue is required to identify and resolve the issue</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">We need to consult known tickets/network tickets (Service Affected Tab) on NTT page</span></span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">In case any customer complains that while using internet he is unable to receive Incoming calls then we will politely guide customer it is a handset dependent feature</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Number should be active</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Account Balance </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Probe for exact issue</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Known Issue on NTT page in eFront</span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>T</strong>ake the <strong><em>Country Code</em></strong> from CDR (Siebel/TABs)</span></span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>Step 2</strong>: Agent will search this particular country code from <strong><em>NTT page</em></strong></span></span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>Step 3</strong>: If there is <strong>Open </strong>trouble ticket in NTT then agent will not acknowledge the complaints and will guide customer as per normal SOP <strong>(Punching of work code is mandatory in this case)</strong></span></span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>Step 4: </strong>If there is closed ticket then agent will pick<strong> Site Code </strong>from NTT and will search this site code from Static Map</span></span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>Step 5:</strong> Check Static Map coverage: </span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Once location found at Map, CCR will follow below matrix to log complaint for NCU</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:white">Guide </span>customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:justify">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Important Guidelines:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Where Country Code in Siebel or cell site against ALOC is not available in NTT then agent will probe for customer location and consult NTT</span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><em>For Postpaid customers we can take country code from Data tickets in Siebel CDR&rsquo;s and follow above steps and for other complaints you can directly ask the location, then verify the coverage status from NTT/Static Map</em></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3<sup>rd</sup> Floor</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Don&rsquo;t use search by customer location for prepaid numbers since we have very limited search count available against location and we can also use Postpaid Data CDR for searching data</li>
	<li>Manual settings ISMS should be used at first attempt (OS wise)</li>
	<li>We need mention/ask customer&rsquo;s other contact number in all complaints ïƒ˜ We need to guide customer about 0308-4400333 call back NDC&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Where customer location is of any areas of Azad Kashmir/Rawla Koat then there is no need to consult Static Map/SSO Portal however we can launch the complaint by mentioning exact location after verifying complete check list</li>
	<li>We have observed few complaints where there is No Balance/No remaining MB&rsquo;s but we have acknowledge the complaint so we need to check Balance/Remaining MB&rsquo;s first properly</li>
	<li>If customer facing issue regarding video downloading need to check customer balance as downloading will be charged on base rate while having Social bundle, Monthly sms bundle data</li>
	<li>In few cases we are guiding customer to remove Cache/Cookies and restart handset without system consultation</li>
	<li>If customer is facing issue regarding specific application we should guide customer to reset/reinstall application (WhatsApp, FB, You Tube etc.)<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

	<li>Sub Area: Power Tools</li>
	<li>Others</li>
	<li>Summary: D-Up Number (mandatory)</li>
	<li>Description: (mandatory) &bull; Issue: (OG/IC call or SMS) &bull; Error Message: &bull; Duration of complaint: &bull; Location of customer:</li>

	<li>Primary number should be active</li>
	<li>Primary number has sufficient balance</li>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If customer has no network (Call/SMS) issue on Primary number and only issue is faced on DoubleUp number then Power Tool SR will be generated against Primary number</li>
	<li>DoubleUp number will not be visible in Siebel</li>
	<li>Charges for subscription fee and usage (call/sms) will be done against the primary number</li>
	<li>Calls/SMS made from DoubleUp number will reflect in Siebel - Call Details against primary number (Party B number will reflect with 88 in the beginning like 8803xxxxxxxxx, as shown in screen shot)</li>
	<li>Regular VAS, SMS and voice bundles, Mobilink load, Balance Share and Jazz Advance cannot be availed through DoubleUP number</li>
	<li>Call connectivity/SMS complaints on short codes (123, 111, 230 etc.) will not be acknowledged for DoubleUp number</li>
	<li>International call and SMS complaints will not be acknowledged for DoubleUp number</li>
</ul>

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer is facing Jazz Advance Sub/Unsub issue then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: TEC Team
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

<ul>
	<li>Type of SR: Value Added Services</li>
	<li>Area: Prepaid</li>
	<li>Sub Area: Bundle Offer</li>
	<li>Summary: Jazz advance</li>
	<li>Detail Description: Customer Exact Issue</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Balance not updated issue:</strong></p>

<p>Checklist:</p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer complaints that Balance of Jazz Advance has not been transferred to his/her account&nbsp;</li>
	<li>whereas IVR confirmed the instruction, following SR will be forwarded:</li>
	<li>Acknowledgment Time: &nbsp;2 hrs</li>
</ul>

<p>Complaint to be launched incase of Balance not updated:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Type of SR: Billing Adjustment</li>
	<li>Area: Credit Note</li>
	<li>Sub Area: Prepaid</li>
	<li>Type: Balance not update<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Subscription validity for Jazz Advance is 4 hours</li>
	<li>If customer complains that IVR (123) is not giving option of Jazz Advance then following are the possible reasons:
	<ul>
		<li>Customer has availed Jazz Advance and has not recharged the balance after that</li>
		<li>Number is pre-loaded SIM</li>
		<li>Current Balance is not less than Rs 15</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Unable to subscribe/unsubscribe service via IVR/USSD</li>
	<li>IVR (123) is not giving option of Jazz Advance</li>
	<li>Service is successfully subscribed Jazz Advance &nbsp;not received OR after unsubscription customer still receiving Jazz Advance &nbsp;(For recursive version of Jazz Advance)</li>
</ul>

	<li>Prepaid Noncommercial packages cannot avail Jazz Advance facility</li>
	<li>We will mention Date and Time: IVR access time in notepad</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Digit4G Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>We will follow below guidleins if cusotmer complains related to Jazz Digit 4G</p>

Submission Channel: 1050,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Process for Restoration of Blocked Handset</strong></p>

<p>Call Center \ Experience Center</p>

<ul>
	<li>Step 1 We need to ask customer specifically which Jazz MSISDN was first time used with DIGIT phone and enter that MSISDN to check for bundle</li>
	<li>Step 2 If bundle is subscribed successfully, We will confirm the search the record in MSISDN STATUS CHECK&gt;DIGIT4G Blocked Numbers</li>
	<li>Step 3 If MSISDN search is unsuccessful, We will ask customer to provide IMEI 1 &amp; search via IMEI1 in IMEI Status Check&gt; DIGIT4G Blocked Numbers *(Check with first 14 digits only)</li>
	<li>Step 4 If customer is having different MSISDN when searched via IMEI, We will guide customer to activate bundle on correct number and provide number to customer</li>
	<li>Step 5 If customer is having same MSISDN &amp; IMEI then we will launch EFRONT activity: Efront &gt; Creator&gt;Handset IMEI Unblocking and provide TAT of 8 working hours (Completer CC Helpdesk Team) along with mentioning Handset IMEI &amp; Date of Bundle Activation &amp; Keyword 4G Digit Handset&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p>Franchise Center:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Step 1 We need to ask customer specifically which Jazz MSISDN was first time used with DIGIT phone and enter that MSISDN in SIEBEL to check for bundle</li>
	<li>Step 2 If bundle is subscribed successfully, We will confirm the search the record in I-EFRONT&gt;Creator&gt;MSISDN STATUS CHECK&gt;DIGIT4G Blocked Numbers</li>
	<li>Step 3 If MSISDN search is unsuccessful, We will ask customer to provide IMEI 1 &amp; search via IMEI1 in I-EFRONT&gt;Creator&gt;IMEI Status Check&gt; DIGIT4G Blocked Numbers *(Check with first 14 digits only)</li>
	<li>Step 4 In case IMEI and MSISDN is same and bundle is subscribed, We need to send e-mail to CC-HELPDESK with below details: &nbsp;&bull; MSISDN &bull; IMEI of Handset &bull; Bundle subscription date &amp; time &nbsp;&bull; Call back Number &nbsp;&bull; Keyword in subject : 4G Digit Handset</li>
	<li>Step 5 We will guide customer to wait for 8 HRS TAT, During which HD will reply email with correct findings&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Bundle Failure&nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>In case customer is unable to subscribe bundle, FCE will check below points and make SR after verifying below
	<ul>
		<li>Customer has enough balance in his account</li>
		<li>Data services must be subscribed on customer number &bull; In case above is true, Agent will process SR in SIEBEL &gt; Smart script &gt;Value Added Service &gt; Prepaid &gt; Bundle Offer&gt; (Please fill all the fields necessary for SR creation like below)</li>
		<li>Bundle Name: Other &bull; Complaint Type: Unable to SUB</li>
		<li>Handset: DIGIT4G</li>
		<li>Summary:*679#</li>
		<li>FCE will guide TAT of 48 Hrs to customer for resolution</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Check handset pairing through e-front in all scenarios where the customer requests for the activation of Digit4G bundle</li>
	<li>Detailed process, Scenarios are attached. Please consult attached PDF if any issue not available in below scenarios/resolutions</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Konnect - QoS and Data Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer is facing network related issue and is faciliated using Konnect tool</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1045,1058,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 3068
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe customer the error message heard / displayed while making / receiving calls</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Inquire the duration if issue to identify since when the issue in Quality of Service is faced</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Ask customer if issue is faced indoor or outdoor</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">More than 15 days indoor issue is known and complaint will not be acknowledged in this case</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Update &ldquo;Work Code&rdquo; in Konnect &amp; guide customer that issue already in notice and will be resolved ASAP</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer is facing outdoor issue or indoor issue for less than 15 days move to next step</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Issue faced on making call on specific number or all numbers?</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If issue faced in QoS on Specific number, guide customer guide customer that no issue in the services on the number as party B may be facing issue &amp; may contact respective help line for assistance</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer didn&rsquo;t&nbsp; try making / receiving call other than a specific number, suggest customer to try with any other number along with checking Konnect to verify any known issues</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If issue faced from / on all numbers move to next step</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Query number in Siebel &amp; check CDRs</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Check called number &amp; ask &ldquo;Sir, Aap ne jo akhri call 0300/0321/ etc. pay ki thi us main XYZ issue aaraha tha?&rdquo; to fetch the 14 digit Country Code from Siebel CDRs</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Copy &ldquo;Country Code&rdquo; &amp; paste in KONNECT &ldquo;Country Code&rdquo; field &amp; CLI (problematic number) in MSISDN field press &ldquo;GO&rdquo; to fetch data</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Click on Site (cell site on map), as per customer location or problematic location, to check &ldquo;Technology Type 2G/3G/LTE&rdquo;</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">For Voice complaint &ldquo;3G&rdquo; coverage prediction is consulted if site is 3G supported</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If site is only 2G supported that then consult 2G map</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe customer exact location &amp; mark on Coverage Map by dragging the Circle/PIN on customer&rsquo;s exact location</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Fourth floor &amp; above and basement complaints will not be acknowledged</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer is in Green/Yellow coverage then move to next step, else handle customer upfront</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe/use time in CDRs (the time when issue was faced) and select same time in Konnect</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Search to check the site status as per color coding of the Site (Green/Red for up/down and other site colors mentioned in Konnect (Grey for site lock)</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Site KPIs is shown once we move the Circle/PIN to the nearest site</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Red, grey, crossed, broader area &amp; blue site colors have known outages and complaint will not be acknowledged</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If site color is Green move to next step, else handle customer upfront</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Refer to previous trending of site KPI to identify if there is no fluctuation in last 24 hours, guide customer that as per system issue is resolved. Complaint will not acknowledge in this case &amp; customer needs to be handled upfront. Exceptions can be handled accordingly. </span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Check &ldquo;Cell Availability&rdquo; &ldquo;Call Drop&rdquo; &amp; &ldquo;Successful Call&rdquo; KPIs</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Where any of the KPI is Red move to next step, else handle the customer upfront</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If complaint is not acknowledged, punch relevant work code in Konnect &ldquo;Punch Work code&rdquo; and guide customer accordingly</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Guide customer to try changing handset and if issue is not resolved and SIM is not recently changed then request customer to get the SIM replaced to avoid inconvenience</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If issue is being faced at single/all locations, needs to change handset and SIM before complaint is created</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset/SIM change should be verified from ADM and Siebel(orders)</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Consult BAD weather updates/ Gmail NOC message on Customer Konnect, if there is any known issue in the area as per&ldquo;BAD weather updates/ Gmail NOC message&rdquo; handle customer upfront.</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Location (specific/all)</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Specific Location</span></span>
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If other customers on same location do not have any issue, guide customer to try changing handset, if issue persist get the SIM changed for uninterrupted services</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset / SIM change should be verified from ADM and Siebel(orders)</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If checklist already completed move to next step</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Exceptions can be handled accordingly</span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All location</span></span>
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">QOS issue at every location, guide customer to try changing handset, if issue persist get the SIM changed for uninterrupted services</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset / SIM change should be verified from ADM and Siebel(orders)</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If checklist already completed move to next step</span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Note: For Echo related complaint guide customer to lower down the speak volume &amp; take off hands free</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Incase issue persists, acknowledge complaint</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Launch following complaint if customer concern is valid</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SR Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cellular</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prepaid/Postpaid</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Sub Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Quality of Service</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Complaint Type: &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Call Drop/Voice Break/Signal Complaint/Cross Talk/No Audio/Audio loop back/Echo</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe Error message heard / displayed</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Duration of issue faced by the customer</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe if the issue is being faced indoor or outdoor, for low indoor cases where customer is facing issue for more than 15 days no complaint will be acknowledged, however if duration is less than 15 days we will move to next probing question</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Issue faced on making call on specific number or all numbers?</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Specific number, party B needs to contact help line for assistance</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Consult HLR (to check any barring) &amp; CRDs (to check outgoing call connectivity) when &amp; where required to differentiate between operational &amp; QOS issue</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Consult static / Mobilive map in &ldquo;Customer Konnect&rdquo; to check coverage prediction &amp; site status</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Consult BAD weather updates/ Gmail NOC message</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Location (specific/all)</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Specific Location</span></span>
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If other customers on same location do not have any issue, guide customer to try changing handset, if issue persist get the SIM changed for uninterrupted services</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset / SIM change should be verified from ADM and Siebel(orders)</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If checklist already completed move to next step</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Exceptions can be handled accordingly</span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All location</span></span>
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">QOS issue at every location, guide customer to try changing handset, if issue persist get the SIM changed for uninterrupted services</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset / SIM change should be verified from ADM and Siebel(orders)</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If checklist already completed move to next step</span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM slot change is not required in QoS voice issues however suggest customer to use Jazz SIM in slot 1 for better service experience.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Note: For Echo related complaint guide customer to lower down the speak volume &amp; take off hands free</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Incase issue persists, acknowledge complaint</span></span></li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Restriction of searching Cell Sites and Areas without MSISDN</span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Any location on Konnect will not be searched without entering MSISDN. Ensure the enter MSISDN/problematic CLI along with Cell Site/Area to search on Konnect</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Problematic site code field will now have a suggested site code dropdown</span></span>
	<ul>
		<li>While entering work code in Konnect against list of value will appear to choose a site ID to avoid punching of any irrelevant information</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 9038

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Konnect - QoS Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer is facing network related issue and is faciliated using Konnect tool</p>

Submission Channel: 1058,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 3068
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <h2>Process at Franchise Center</h2>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Franchise to follow existing process</span></span></li>
</ul>

<h2>Process at Retailer</h2>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Guide customer to contact nearest office or call helpline</span></span></li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe customer the error message heard / displayed while making / receiving calls</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Inquire the duration if issue to identify since when the issue in Quality of Service is faced</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Ask customer if issue is faced indoor or outdoor</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">More than 15 days indoor issue is known and complaint will not be acknowledged in this case</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Update &ldquo;Work Code&rdquo; in Konnect &amp; guide customer that issue already in notice and will be resolved ASAP</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer is facing outdoor issue or indoor issue for less than 15 days move to next step</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Issue faced on making call on specific number or all numbers?</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If issue faced in QoS on Specific number, guide customer guide customer that no issue in the services on the number as party B may be facing issue &amp; may contact respective help line for assistance</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer didn&rsquo;t&nbsp; try making / receiving call other than a specific number, suggest customer to try with any other number along with checking Konnect to verify any known issues</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If issue faced from / on all numbers move to next step</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Query number in Siebel &amp; check CDRs</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Check called number &amp; ask &ldquo;Sir, Aap ne jo akhri call 0300/0321/ etc. pay ki thi us main XYZ issue aaraha tha?&rdquo; to fetch the 14 digit Country Code from Siebel CDRs</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif; font-size:12pt">Copy &ldquo;Country Code&rdquo; &amp; paste in KONNECT &ldquo;Country Code&rdquo; field &amp; CLI (problematic number) in MSISDN field press &ldquo;GO&rdquo; to fetch data</span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:justify">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">1.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal">Enter problematic MSISDN in konnect</span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal">2.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;An OTP will be sent to the customer with the following SMS text;</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal">Dear Customer, Please provide OTP XXXX to our Experience Center Representative for your Network related concerns. Please ignore if you are not in our center.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal">3.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Agent will ask the OTP from the customer and enter it relevant field in Konnect</span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal">4.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Once the OTP is entered, the CJI filed will be enabled and agent can punched the CJI (country network code) taken from Siebel (CDRs)&nbsp;</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Click on Site (cell site on map), as per customer location or problematic location, to check &ldquo;Technology Type 2G/3G/LTE&rdquo;</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">For Voice complaint &ldquo;3G&rdquo; coverage prediction is consulted if site is 3G supported</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If site is only 2G supported that then consult 2G map</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe customer exact location &amp; mark on Coverage Map by dragging the Circle/PIN on customer&rsquo;s exact location</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Fourth floor &amp; above and basement complaints will not be acknowledged</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer is in Green/Yellow coverage then move to next step, else handle customer upfront</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe/use time in CDRs (the time when issue was faced) and select same time in Konnect</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Search to check the site status as per color coding of the Site (Green/Red for up/down and other site colors mentioned in Konnect (Grey for site lock)</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Site KPIs is shown once we move the Circle/PIN to the nearest site</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Red, grey, crossed, broader area &amp; blue site colors have known outages and complaint will not be acknowledged</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If site color is Green move to next step, else handle customer upfront</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Refer to previous trending of site KPI to identify if there is no fluctuation in last 24 hours, guide customer that as per system issue is resolved. Complaint will not acknowledge in this case &amp; customer needs to be handled upfront. Exceptions can be handled accordingly. </span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Check &ldquo;Cell Availability&rdquo; &ldquo;Call Drop&rdquo; &amp; &ldquo;Successful Call&rdquo; KPIs</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Where any of the KPI is Red move to next step, else handle the customer upfront</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If complaint is not acknowledged, punch relevant work code in Konnect &ldquo;Punch Work code&rdquo; and guide customer accordingly</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Guide customer to try changing handset and if issue is not resolved and SIM is not recently changed then request customer to get the SIM replaced to avoid inconvenience</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If issue is being faced at single/all locations, needs to change handset and SIM before complaint is created</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset/SIM change should be verified from ADM and Siebel(orders)</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Consult BAD weather updates/ Gmail NOC message on Customer Konnect, if there is any known issue in the area as per&ldquo;BAD weather updates/ Gmail NOC message&rdquo; handle customer upfront.</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Location (specific/all)</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Specific Location</span></span>
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If other customers on same location do not have any issue, guide customer to try changing handset, if issue persist get the SIM changed for uninterrupted services</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset / SIM change should be verified from ADM and Siebel(orders)</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If checklist already completed move to next step</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Exceptions can be handled accordingly</span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All location</span></span>
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">QOS issue at every location, guide customer to try changing handset, if issue persist get the SIM changed for uninterrupted services</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset / SIM change should be verified from ADM and Siebel(orders)</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If checklist already completed move to next step</span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Note: For Echo related complaint guide customer to lower down the speak volume &amp; take off hands free</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Incase issue persists, acknowledge complaint</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Launch following complaint if customer concern is valid</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SR Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cellular</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prepaid/Postpaid</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Sub Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Quality of Service</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Complaint Type: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Call Drop/Voice Break/Signal Complaint/Cross Talk/No Audio/Audio loop back/Echo</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe Error message heard / displayed</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Duration of issue faced by the customer</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe if the issue is being faced indoor or outdoor, for low indoor cases where customer is facing issue for more than 15 days no complaint will be acknowledged, however if duration is less than 15 days we will move to next probing question</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Issue faced on making call on specific number or all numbers?</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Specific number, party B needs to contact help line for assistance</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Consult HLR (to check any barring) &amp; CRDs (to check outgoing call connectivity) when &amp; where required to differentiate between operational &amp; QOS issue</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Consult static / Mobilive map in &ldquo;Customer Konnect&rdquo; to check coverage prediction &amp; site status</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">1.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal">Enter problematic MSISDN in konnect</span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal">2.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;An OTP will be sent to the customer with the following SMS text;</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal">Dear Customer, Please provide OTP XXXX to our Experience Center Representative for your Network related concerns. Please ignore if you are not in our center.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal">3.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Agent will ask the OTP from the customer and enter it relevant field in Konnect</span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal">4.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Once the OTP is entered, the CJI filed will be enabled and agent can punched the CJI (country network code) taken from Siebel (CDRs)&nbsp;</span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Consult BAD weather updates/ Gmail NOC message</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Location (specific/all)</span></span>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Specific Location</span></span>

		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If other customers on same location do not have any issue, guide customer to try changing handset, if issue persist get the SIM changed for uninterrupted services</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset / SIM change should be verified from ADM and Siebel(orders)</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If checklist already completed move to next step</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Exceptions can be handled accordingly</span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All location</span></span>
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">QOS issue at every location, guide customer to try changing handset, if issue persist get the SIM changed for uninterrupted services</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset / SIM change should be verified from ADM and Siebel(orders)</span></span></li>
			<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If checklist already completed move to next step</span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM slot change is not required in QoS voice issues however suggest customer to use Jazz SIM in slot 1 for better service experience.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Note: For Echo related complaint guide customer to lower down the speak volume &amp; take off hands free</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Incase issue persists, acknowledge complaint</span></span></li>

			<td style="border-bottom:none; border-left:none; border-right:none; border-top:none; height:24px; width:0px">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td rowspan="2" style="background-color:white; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:92px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">WHITE</span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td rowspan="2" style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:92px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">NO Coverage </span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:92px; width:205px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">CCR will not entertain complaint but will only lock work code in efront as per existing process, CCR will politely guide customer about <strong>No coverage</strong> in that area informing that we are trying to provide coverage in these areas as soon as possible</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td rowspan="2" style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:92px; width:198px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">work code: pertaining to customer query</span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:none; border-left:none; border-right:none; border-top:none; height:115px; width:0px">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:.2in; width:205px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">TAT:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black"> No timeline </span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:none; border-left:none; border-right:none; border-top:none; height:24px; width:0px">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If NTT shows Jammers in the Area then we need to inform customer that there are Jammers installed in the area and customer may face network issue at this location</li>
	<li>If any Network complaint is closed with Notes &ldquo;No further Redesign is possible&rdquo;, then we will not acknowledge same complaint for next 3 months and apologies with the customer suggested statement. However, if customer complaints for any other network related issue, we will acknowledge the complaint</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check auto-mode and if it is not on auto-mode then guide customer to check with auto-mode</li>
	<li>If customer is unable call on all numbers OR any particular number and getting Network related message, like &lsquo;Network Busy, Call Failed, Call end without any message&rsquo; etc. We will process QoS related complaint and select the Congestion/Call Failed head</li>
	<li>Handling for network issues like Signal, Call Drop, Call Connectivity issues etc. faced due to Power Failure issues only:
	<ul>
		<li>As per our current practice ; after probing if we identified that issue is due to power failure only (network issue is faced only during WAPDA outage) then we will inform customer (all segments) upfront that issue is being faced due to prolonged power failure and will be resolved when overall situation gets better.&nbsp;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>We will not make self-completed Signal Related SR instead we will make entry in NTT page against Power failure Work Codes in KNOWN TICKETS and/ or NETWORK TICKETS as per customer complaint.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>In case customer faces issue like call congestion or call drop etc. during power failure only, then also we will make entry against power failure</li>
	<li>Exceptions can be forwarded to team leaders. Team Leaders can process Power Failure complaints for such cases and they need to send email to relevant NCU Team as well along with processing SR only in exceptional cases.</li>
	<li>We will not make escalation activities on already created/ completed activities and handle customers, as per above mentioned guidelines.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>If NTT is open, we need to punch NTT as we are not forwarding any complaint in this scenario</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: VoLTE Pilot Launch in Taxila- Activation/Deactivation
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer calls over helpline or visit front-office for VoLTE services activation/deactivation the below guidelines will be followed</p>

Submission Channel: 41,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>VoLTE Activation:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>In case we receive any request for VoLTE activation at call center or any other touchpoint, below process will be followed
	<ul>
		<li>Agent will guide all pre-requisites for VoLTE service as mentioned in Checklist</li>
		<li>Agent will politely guide customer as per standard statement</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Standard Statement:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>VoLTE Deactivation:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>For deactivation, Agent will create activity in EFRONT:</li>
</ul>

<ol style="margin-left:40px">
	<li>Go to EFRONT&rarr;Search number in creator TAB&rarr;select &ldquo;VoLTE deactivation&rdquo; &amp; create activity</li>
</ol>

<ul>
	<li>Activity will be routed to IT-CRMOPSTEAM@jazz.com.pk for deactivation and will be processed in 2 working days</li>
</ul>

<ul>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Currently only customers in Taxila will be provisioned for VoLTE from backend</li>
	<li>Provisioning of VoLTE service will <strong>NOT </strong>be done from frontend channels</li>
	<li>Standard statement to be used in case any customer calls over&nbsp;helpline for activation</li>
	<li>In order for VoLTE service to work, LTE must be pre-activated on number</li>
	<li>The numbers which are eligible for VOLTE provisioning must meet the following criteria: :&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Numbers must not have IR service activated</li>
		<li>The following VAS services must not be tagged against the number :
		<ul>
			<li>VIP Call</li>
			<li>My Status</li>
			<li>Wireless Caller ID</li>
			<li>ICS</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>The number should be installed in the whitelisted handset&nbsp;</li>
	<li>The customer should be in Taxila&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Currently eligible base of official numbers will be provisioned for VoLTE directly from backend (customers having eligible handsets &amp; present in Taxila)</li>
	<li>VoLTE will be visible in assets as &ldquo;VoLTE Postpaid&rdquo;</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>VoLTE service activation/deactivation will be hidden from CRM</li>
	<li>LTE will be activated via tech team directly in batches. First batch of eligible customers will be activated as per criteria (see Check List).</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>As per Scenario</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check the status of service in CSRTB, HLR and Portal</li>
	<li>Check Service Subscription and expiry time from portal</li>
	<li>Check Screening Mode selection through Portal</li>
	<li>Confirm Desired number is added in Blacklist and or Whitelist</li>
	<li>Customer wants to activate/deactivate ICS service then we need to offer online activation/deactivation with proper consent.</li>
	<li>ICS does not work with IR, Auto Reply, My Status Service</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If customer wants to add other network number in blacklist and enables Black List option then the calls of that particular number will be blocked immediately however SMS will get blocked in 24hrs</li>
</ul>

<p>We need to offer Jazz caller name service to customer while handling other CLI confirmation&nbsp;or obnoxious caller name related queries</p>

<ul>
	<li>Jazz Caller Name service addresses the issue of receiving &ldquo;Unknown Calls&rdquo;. Customer can know the name of unknown callers</li>
	<li>Users can identify the name of the callers before answering the incoming call via flash SMS even if the caller&rsquo;s name is not saved in the contact list</li>
	<li>The distinctive feature about Jazz Caller Name is that it does not require internet or any application to be downloaded</li>
	<li>Any Jazz customer can subscribe to this service regardless of what phone model they own</li>
	<li>For details please consult KMS&rarr;B2C&rarr;Products&rarr;Value Added Services-&rarr;Jazz Caller Name Service</li>
</ul>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 17560

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Wrong IVR Related Complaint
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p style="text-align:left"><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Calibri"><span style="color:black">Incase customer faced Postpaid 111 IVR is playing on a Prepaid number or vice versa and IVR connectivity issues then we will follow below process to rectify:</span></span></span></p>

<div class="O0" style="margin-left:36px; text-align:left; text-indent:-.25in"><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Arial">&bull;</span><span style="font-family:Calibri"><span style="color:black">Postpaid IVR is playing on a Prepaid number</span></span></span></div>

<div class="O0" style="margin-left:36px; text-align:left; text-indent:-.25in"><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Arial">&bull;</span><span style="font-family:Calibri"><span style="color:black">Prepaid IVR playing on a Postpaid number</span></span></span></div>

<div class="O0" style="margin-left:36px; text-align:left; text-indent:-.25in"><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Arial">&bull;</span><span style="font-family:Calibri"><span style="color:black">IVR connectivity issues</span></span></span></div>

Submission Channel: 1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 26
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p style="text-align:left">As per Scenario&nbsp;</p>

Checklist Items: <div class="O0" style="margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:36px; margin-top:20px; text-align:left; text-indent:-.25in">
<div class="O0" style="margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:36px; margin-top:20px; text-align:left; text-indent:-.25in">
<p><span style="color:#f39c12"><strong>Initial Troubleshooting by Agent</strong></span></p>

<p><span style="color:#f39c12">When a customer reports <strong>IVR connectivity issues</strong>, the agent will first check if the customer has <strong>VoLTE (Voice over LTE) service enabled</strong> on their device.</span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#f39c12">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;If <strong>VoLTE is active</strong>, the agent will guide the customer to:</span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#f39c12"><strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Turn off VoLTE</strong> from device settings.</span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#f39c12">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Ask customer to&nbsp;<strong>Restart the handset</strong> incase after retarting the handset issue still persist then <strong>Change&nbsp;the handset </strong>remedy will be perofmed&nbsp;and try again to connect the call to IVR (Both remedies will be guided in a same call)</span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="color:#2ecc71"><strong>Creating a Case in SO</strong></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#2ecc71">If the issue persists after troubleshooting, then agent will:</span>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="color:#2ecc71"><strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Log a case in SO&nbsp;</strong>for backend investigation.</span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>
</div>

<p class="O0" style="margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:36px; margin-top:20px; text-indent:-0.25in"><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Arial">&bull;</span><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-family:Calibri">Please check if customer&rsquo;s IVR is blocked on crank caller for 90 days through CSRTB and guide customer accordingly </span></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:36px"><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Arial">&bull;</span><span style="font-family:Calibri">Check CSRTB&rarr; Contracts&rarr; Consumption tab&rarr; Product: 9547</span></span></span></p>

<p class="O0" style="margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:36px; margin-top:20px; text-indent:-0.25in"><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Arial">&bull;</span><span style="font-family:Calibri">Ask customer about which IVR flow is following and if he is not aware about IVR flow then agent will guide customer about correct flow to rout call on helpline (IVR flow is attached)</span></span></span></p>
</div>

			<td style="background-color:#fbe4d5; border-bottom:2px solid #f4b083; border-left:none; border-right:2px solid #f4b083; border-top:none; height:131px; width:66px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Active</span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="background-color:#fbe4d5; border-bottom:2px solid #f4b083; border-left:none; border-right:2px solid #f4b083; border-top:none; height:131px; width:122px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Recycled</span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="background-color:#fbe4d5; border-bottom:2px solid #f4b083; border-left:none; border-right:2px solid #f4b083; border-top:none; height:131px; width:667px">
			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Number has been recycled and being used by new Subscriber now. Guide customer visit nearest touchpoint to purchase any-other available number as per new sale process. No complaint will be acknowledged in this case.</span></span></p>

			<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><img alt="cid:image013.jpg@01D50977.AF7B28A0" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," style="height:85px; width:710px" /></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">SR will be made on customer claim that number was regularly used but has been recycled</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">SR Creator need to perform <strong>manual routing on Dummy_15</strong> at the time of SR creation for Jazz Prepaid Service Recovery team, so we need to ensure that <strong>auto-assign option is not selected for this SR </strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Other callback number is mandatory at the time of SR creation</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Numbers are recycled if no charged usage activity found during last 180 days</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:72px"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Courier New&quot;">o</span>&nbsp;&nbsp; In case a number is not used for any charged activity for 90 days then its balance goes to zero and status as dormant (Customer can recharge his number to start using that connection again)</span></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:72px"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Courier New&quot;">o</span>&nbsp;&nbsp; In case a number is not used even after 90 days of Dormant status then number is recycled</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">For escalation on any pending out of TAT SR, helpline Team leader can coordinate with backend team by mentioning complete details over email (<a href="http://JAZZPREPAIDSERVICERECOVERY@jazz.com.pk" style="color:blue; text-decoration:underline" target="_blank">JAZZPREPAIDSERVICERECOVERY@jazz.com.pk</a>)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Callback will be done by Jazz Prepaid Service Recovery team once response is received from Number Management team</span></span></li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Sensitive Tagging/De-Tagging and Overall Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>This process outlines the steps for tagging or de-tagging a customer&#39;s number as <strong>&ldquo;Sensitive&rdquo;</strong>, along with other relevant requests or information. It ensures controlled handling of sensitive numbers while maintaining security and compliance.</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1058,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 1063,6175
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>NON Commercial de-tagging request:</p>

<p>âœ… If a&nbsp;<strong>CNIC has both a commercial and a non-commercial number</strong>, and the customer wants to perform an activity on the&nbsp;<strong>commercial number</strong>, the CNIC&nbsp;<strong>will be de-tagged</strong>.&nbsp;<br />
âœ… In this case, the&nbsp;<strong>request will not be cancelled.</strong></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><strong>B2I Requests from Selective Franchises:</strong></h4>

<p>âœ…&nbsp;<strong>Sensitive Tagging/De-Tagging</strong>&nbsp;requests will be catered only from selected franchises if a B2I (Business-to-Individual) activity is required. Agent will mention the details in case.<br />
âœ…&nbsp;<strong>Franchise List</strong>&nbsp;is attached</p>

Checklist Items: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">Number&nbsp;<strong>should not be&nbsp;</strong>Retailers, Non-Commercial, Official, Employee, dealer, ex-employee as this process is for normal customers only.</span></span></span></span></span></p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:12px"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Please be informed that where signature is available on CNIC then agent&nbsp;need to take sign on undertaking form but where customer is a lay man and thumb impression is available on CNIC then agent&nbsp;&nbsp;will take thumb impression on undertaking form. </span></span></p>
	</li>
</ul>
