ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: VoLTE Pilot Launch in Taxila- Activation/Deactivation-DBSS
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer calls over helpline or visit front-office for VoLTE services activation/deactivation the below guidelines will be followed</p>

Submission Channel: 1050,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>VoLTE Activation:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>In case we receive any request for VoLTE activation at call center or any other touchpoint, below process will be followed
	<ul>
		<li>Agent will guide all pre-requisites for VoLTE service as mentioned in Checklist</li>
		<li>Agent will politely guide customer as per standard statement</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Standard Statement:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>English</strong>: Dear Customer, VoLTE service is currently not offered commercially. You will be able to access VoLTE services once it is available for all customers. Thank you for your understanding</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Urdu</strong>: Moaziz saarif, VoLTE service filhal mukamal tor par muyassar nahin hai. Aap yeh service tamam saarfeen ke liye dastiyab hone par istemal kar sakain gay. Aapke taawun ka shukria.<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>VoLTE Deactivation:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>For deactivation, follow given navigation;
	<ul>
		<li>CSRTB&nbsp;&rarr; Contracts&nbsp;&rarr; Barring window &rarr;&nbsp; VAS tab&nbsp;&rarr; VoLTE&nbsp;&rarr; Change&nbsp;&rarr; Uncheck box &amp; save&nbsp;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Currently only customers in Taxila will be provisioned for VoLTE from backend</li>
	<li>Provisioning of VoLTE service will <strong>NOT </strong>be done from frontend channels</li>
	<li>Standard statement to be used in case any customer calls over&nbsp;helpline for activation</li>
	<li>In order for VoLTE service to work, LTE must be pre-activated on number</li>
	<li>The numbers which are eligible for VOLTE provisioning must meet the following criteria: :&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Numbers must not have IR service activated</li>
		<li>The following VAS services must not be tagged against the number :
		<ul>
			<li>VIP Call</li>
			<li>My Status</li>
			<li>Wireless Caller ID</li>
			<li>ICS</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>The number should be installed in the whitelisted handset&nbsp;</li>
	<li>The customer should be in Taxila&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Currently eligible base of official numbers will be provisioned for VoLTE directly from backend (customers having eligible handsets &amp; present in Taxila)</li>
	<li>VoLTE will be visible in assets as &ldquo;VoLTE Postpaid&rdquo;</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>VoLTE service activation/deactivation will be hidden from CRM</li>
	<li>LTE will be activated via tech team directly in batches. First batch of eligible customers will be activated as per criteria (see Check List).</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Digit4G Handset Dead on Arrival (DOA)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer calls at helpline to ask about Jazz digit 4G Handset DOA, proble customer to establish their eligibiltiy for DOA.&nbsp;</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:16px">Ask cusotmer if the handset was bought within 7 days of the call. </span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:16px">If Y<strong>es</strong>; explore issue with the handset by asking the Probing questions below: </span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:16px">If <strong>No</strong>; Follow warranty Claim SOPs.&nbsp;</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Probing Questions</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The handset is Valid for Dead on Arrival if:&nbsp;</span></span>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">was handset&nbsp;Dead at the time of purchase</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Is the Screen stuck/Hanged</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Is Speaker/Keybad/Screen or any other part is faulty.&nbsp;</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If &nbsp;<strong>Yes</strong>: Guide customer to visit their nearest franchise or Experience center for DOA claims.&nbsp;</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If <strong>No</strong>: Follow Warranty SOPs.&nbsp;</span></span></li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1044,41
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6183
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If the product is found Dead on Arrival Vendor (Digit) provides immediate free of cost replacement handset</li>
	<li>Box, Handset and all original accessories should be available at the time of processing DOA claim</li>
	<li>Tampering or water damage are not covered in DOA</li>
	<li>Business Center agent will confirm the DOA handset activation date. (Activation date and complaint date must be same) it is a mandatory step to confirm before processing DOA claim</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1044,41
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6183
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Check if customer is using Jazz/SIM in SIM slot 1 </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Any network SIM can be used in SIM slot 2 if SIM slot 1 holds Jazz SIM</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Ensure that it is not a ported out to other networks, such SIM&rsquo;s will wor</span></span><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">k in SIM slot 2 only</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Handset pairing can be verified through CSRTB as per following path: SC attached&nbsp;</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>Handset Pairing Check Status in CSRTB:</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>CSRTB -&gt;&gt;Consumers -&gt;&gt;Customer ID -&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Devices</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Digit Handset IMEI blocking status can also be checked through CX portal&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Before locking the complaint for Backoffice (Digit Handset), agent needs to check the IMEI status from the portal</li>
	<li>After making the payment handset whitelisting purposed timeline is 2 Hours</li>
	<li>For EIR IMEI check option in CX portal existing users will have to re-login to the CX Portal</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If customer complaint that he\she is unable to use &amp; install WhatsApp in Digit 4G handset and error received&nbsp;<strong>( WhatsApp Blocked</strong> ) then customer facilitated upfront. Installation video is attached&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Incase&nbsp;where customers have subscribed 12 Digit Mobile Bundles as per requirement and Package counter is detagged from CSRTB then we will consider that 12 installments have been completed and no further verification is required and relevant case will be forwarded to Concern team for IMEI Whitelisting</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

<ul>
</ul>

Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6085
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.

		</tr>
		<tr>

			</td>

	</tbody>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Prepaid IR - Activation/Deactivation
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Process of Prepaid International Roaming activation and deactivation</p>

Submission Channel: 1052
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: sabeeha.riaz
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 18,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Customer wants to activate/deactivate Prepaid IR</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Ask customer destination country</li>
	<li>To Add/remove IR we wil follow below process:
	<ul>
		<li>Go to CSRTB&nbsp;&rarr; Contracts &rarr; enter MSISDN &rarr; Select ROAMING &rarr; press change on IR data /IR no data &rarr; Add/remove as required</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>To activate IR bundles
	<ul>
		<li>Go to CSRTB &rarr; Contracts &rarr; enter MSISDN &rarr; Select ROAMING &rarr; press change on respective IR bundle &rarr; press add</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>For activation: Number should be active</li>
	<li>For deactivation: check IR is active on customer number</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>GPRS/Data services will not work on IR except KSA (Saudia Ariabia)</li>
	<li>If customer is travelling to KSA and also want IR with DATA, it is mandatory to guide DATA charges on IR</li>
	<li>If customer come back in Pakistan, his GPRS/DATA will be activated automatically no need to activate again (if previously activated)</li>
	<li>Ghanta Offer, LNO offer &amp; Daily SMS bundle package etc (discounted packages) will not be available for use while IR is active.</li>
	<li>If number is not on customer&rsquo;s name and he/she is unable to provide verification, we will guide ownership process (Mobilink NDC only)</li>
	<li>ICS does not work with IR, Auto Reply, My Status Service</li>
	<li>Prepaid customers who request for IR activation, would&nbsp;<strong>continue using their data services</strong>&nbsp;in Pakistan</li>
	<li>Call forwarding unconditional will work with IR</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>2G/3G Sunset Areas</strong></p>
	</li>
	<li><strong>Singapore</strong></li>
	<li><strong>Japan</strong></li>
	<li><strong>Australia</strong></li>
</ul>

<p><strong><u>Guidelines for Agents:</u></strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Voice Roaming</strong> will not work in the affected countries, as the recipient network has sunset their 2G/3G networks.</li>
	<li>Only <strong>Data Roaming</strong> is available.</li>
	<li>Customers must opt for <strong>IR Voice with Data Services</strong> (which include Voice and Data).</li>
	<li>Customers are required to purchase a <strong>bundle</strong>, as Pay-As-You-Go (PAYG) data is blocked by default.</li>
	<li>Ensure the <strong>APN</strong> is set to &ldquo;jazz&rdquo;.</li>
	<li><strong>Data Roaming</strong> must be enabled on the customer&rsquo;s handset.</li>
	<li>The <strong>Network Mode</strong> should be set to &ldquo;2G/3G/LTE&rdquo; to ensure LTE connectivity / Network Latching.</li>
	<li>
	<p>At present, <strong>Voice Roaming (both incoming and outgoing)</strong> are completely barred in these regions. In order to receive incoming SMS messages, customers must opt for data roaming services (with roaming bundles)</p>
	</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Restoration from Block on Stolen
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Customer can contact Jazz for resotration of a number blocked on stolen. We will follow below guidedlines</p>

<p><strong>Lov&#39;s:&nbsp;</strong>Creator Tab/Restoration - Prepaid/Restoration - Prepaid</p>

<p><strong>Team:</strong>&nbsp;Operations and Financial Management</p>

Submission Channel: 1052
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: sabeeha.riaz
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 1062,6075
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>How to perform Restoration</strong>:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will go to CSRTB &rarr; enter number in contracts &rarr; in barring tab, click on&nbsp;<strong>change button</strong>&nbsp;in front of complete barring &rarr; in message window ;write complete verifications and note CLI &rarr; uncheck checkbox on &quot;stolen&quot; &rarr; press save &rarr; refresh page and check in memos for notes &amp; instructions completed</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Postpaid</strong></p>

<p><strong><em>Postpaid blocking/Restoration will be done in CSRTB barring window --&gt; Suspension&nbsp;Tab</em></strong></p>

<p><strong>NOTE:<br />
Please do not use predefined message template while performing restoration</strong></p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Blocking reason should be &quot;STOLEN&quot;</li>
	<li>We need to consult KMS --&gt;MSISDN/IMEI search --&gt;No Action Tag to check if number is No Action tagged.</li>
	<li>Check outstanding balance against Postpaid number. If balance is exceeding the defined credit limit please politely ask customer to pay the due amount before restoration</li>
	<li>At the time of Restoration (from Block on Stolen) we need to verify any one of the additional information as well (it can be other than additional verification provided at the time of blocking)</li>
	<li>&quot;Sensitive customer&quot; need to be facilitate upfront</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>For regular customers where number is already blocked on non-payment guide customer to clear bill.</li>
	<li>Mention the Calling CLI in &quot;Notes&rdquo; against resumed number</li>
	<li>We will mention verification in comments as per current practice</li>
	<li>Need to guide USSD *8822# where customer asking to getting his number restored via self service at helpline/frontend along with Blocking or Restoration from CRM</li>
	<li>it is mandatory to mention verification/notes/CLI in comments</li>
	<li>If number is blocked/restored from franchise without any clear notes, will consider it level 2/3 blocking/restoration</li>
	<li>Retailer Number cannot be restored over the helpline (111). Guide retailer to contact respective DO</li>
	<li>In case a postpaid number is blocked on reconciliation, restore it, after level 3 verification, IF outstanding dues are under defined credit limit.</li>
	<li>At the time of Restoration (from Block on Stolen), need to verify any one of the additional information as well (it can be other than additional verification provided at the time of blocking)</li>
	<li>Handset restart option is required after number&rsquo;s restoration/unblocking so that customers can use data services</li>
	<li>Details for Block on Stolen/Restoration through USSD *8822# are attached</li>
	<li>We can restore the number if call received from other CLI of same CNIC,&nbsp;after probing</li>
	<li>Outgoing Barring (only OG &amp; Data) is not available till further notice. Customer can only use&nbsp;complete barring feature via *8822#</li>
	<li>Number restoration can only&nbsp;be performed from same CLI (Block on stolen MSISSDN)&nbsp;via *8822#</li>
	<li>*8822# Blocking&nbsp;medium can be&nbsp;verify via&nbsp;<strong>MEMO (USSD)</strong>&nbsp;in CSRtb.</li>
	<li><strong>&quot;Sensitive&quot;</strong>&nbsp;tagged numbers cannot be blocked or restorated via *8822#</li>
	<li>If customer complaints that his/her number is getting blocked without his consent, guide&nbsp;customer to get his number tagged as (<strong>sensitive</strong>) to avoid blocking.</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Voluntary Blocking
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>In case any prepaid/postpaid customer calls on helpline and asks for VOL block, below are the guidlines to be followed.</p>

Submission Channel: 1058
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: sabeeha.riaz
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Postpaid Voluntary Blocking:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Go to CSRTB &rarr; enter number in contracts &rarr; in barring tab, click on change button in front of <strong>Suspension barring</strong>&nbsp;&rarr; write complete verifications and note CLI &rarr; click checkbox on &quot;voluntary&quot;&nbsp;&rarr; press save &rarr; refresh page and check in memos for notes &amp; instructions completed

	<ul>
		<li>Do not select &quot;Predefined message&quot; &amp; update complete notes in &quot;Message&quot; field</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Prepaid Voluntary blocking ( 90 days from last revenue generating activity)</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Go to CSRTB &rarr; enter number in contracts &rarr; in barring tab, click on change button in front of<strong>&nbsp;Complete barring</strong>&nbsp;ïƒ  write complete verifications and note CLI &rarr; click checkbox on &quot;voluntary&quot; &rarr; press save &rarr; refresh page and check in memos for notes &amp; instructions completed</li>
	<li>Do not select &quot;Predefined message&quot; &amp; update complete notes in &quot;Message&quot; field mentioning blocking reason &amp; verification<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Checklist Items: <p><strong>Prepaid Voluntary blocking ( 90 days from last revenue generating activity)</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Charged activity in last 30 days (revenue generating activity)</li>
	<li>Ask reason for Voluntary blocking</li>
	<li>Probe customer to &nbsp;clarify between block on stolen / Disown and Voluntary blocking. Ensure that BOS or Disown requests are not catered under VOL block</li>
	<li>Call from same CLI</li>
	<li>VOL block will not be committed for more then 90 days from the last revenue generating activity</li>
	<li>After 90 days, number may be permanently blocked/recycled as per policy</li>
	<li>In case of balance availability, customer must be guided to utilize available balance (through balance share/usage etc.)</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Restoration from Voluntary Blocking</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p>For the restoration of number customer will call on helpline or visit experience center.</p>
	</li>
	<li>Check collection path before restoration.Collection path in billing TAB must not be&nbsp;<strong>DNR_B2C.</strong>
	<ul>
		<li>Auto restoration is not applicable on this collection path. Before restoration following checks needs to be taken</li>
		<li>Deposit should be as per Package plan</li>
		<li>In case of write off, write off amount should be cleared&nbsp;</li>
		<li>Pending dues should be cleared.</li>
		<li>If Number is Vol block with Waiver amount and customer wans to restore the number within 90 Days,&nbsp;agent can restore the number.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Restore the number from CRM with note proper notes.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong><em>Postpaid blocking/Restoration will be done in CSRTB barring window --&gt; Suspension&nbsp;Tab</em></strong></p>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Postpaid Voluntary blocking</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Valid original customer</li>
	<li>While blocking any number on voluntary tag, it is mandatory to mention verifications in notes</li>
	<li>For Company numbers customer will be routed to KAM/BHL</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:yellow">Agent will guide customer to clear all outstanding dues before VOL block to avoid any late payment fee charges.&nbsp;</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:yellow">If customer insists to block without paying outstanding amount, agent will guide regarding late payment fee.</span> </span></span></li>
	<li>Outstanding balance should not be greater than security deposit. If a number has deposit and his total debt amount&nbsp;is equal to deposit, agent can process the blocking with voluntary suspension tag.&nbsp;<strong>For Example:</strong> A number has 1200 security deposit, then outstanding should not be more than 1200.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong> Additional oustanding amount need to be taken from customer.</p>

<ul>
	<li>For Direct debit cases, outstanding dues clearance is not mandatory.</li>
	<li>If number is on waiver so unbilled should be zero, then agent can process voluntary suspension.</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 15712

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: VoWiFi - Act/Deact and Complaint Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer contacts Jazz for VoWiFI activation / Deactivation or Complaint then we will follow below guidelines:</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: mehroz.fatima
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6106
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <ol start="17">
	<li><strong>What is the difference between Wi-Fi Calling and VoLTE?</strong></li>
</ol>

<ol>
	<li>VoLTE uses LTE network, while Wi-Fi Calling uses your Wi-Fi network for extended network coverage and enhanced voice &amp; SMS experience.</li>
</ol>

<ol start="17">
	<li><strong>Will there be any additional charges for VoWiFi services?</strong></li>
</ol>

<ol>
	<li>VoWiFi charging regime will follow VoLTE charging.</li>
</ol>

<ol start="17">
	<li><strong>Will I be able to use VoWiFi if called-party is not VoLTE or VoWiFi-capable?</strong></li>
</ol>

<ol>
	<li>Yes, you may still initiate calls and receive calls. However, the quality of call will not be in HD.</li>
</ol>

<ol start="17">
	<li><strong>I already have a Wi-Fi Calling icon on my phone, but I still cannot call or send a text message using a Wi-Fi network?</strong></li>
</ol>

<ol>
	<li>Make sure that the Wi-Fi network that you are connected to has an excellent signal strength and an internet speed of at least 100 kbps.</li>
</ol>

<ol start="17">
	<li><strong>Can I use Wi-Fi Calling even if VoLTE switch is disabled on handset, or vice versa</strong></li>
	<li>Yes. Wi-Fi Calling will still work even if VoLTE switch is disabled on handset. However, if VoLTE is disabled, your ongoing call will get disconnected if your handset has lost its Wi-Fi connection. For seamless/ uninterrupted call experience, please enable both Wi-Fi Calling and VoLTE service</li>
</ol>

<p>Q.&nbsp;How to activate VoWifi?</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Samsung : &nbsp;Connections -&gt; Wi-Fi Calling -&gt; Enable</strong></li>
	<li><strong>OPPO(+REALME) : Mobile Network -&gt; SIM info &amp; settings -&gt; Wi-Fi Calling</strong></li>
	<li><strong>XIAOMI (MI+READMI+POCO) : Mobile Network -&gt; SIM card settings&nbsp; -&gt; Make calls using WLAN</strong></li>
	<li><strong>Apple VoFI calling&nbsp; support is in pipeline.</strong></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Q.How to use VoWifi?</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Just Enable above settings and you can use where there is low coverage</strong></li>
</ul>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Q.Is it available on my Handset?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Visit this website to verify is JazzFi Service is available on the Handset &nbsp;<a href="https://jazz.com.pk/jazzfi">https://jazz.com.pk/jazzfi</a>.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Q.How can I check Handset compatibility?</p>

<ul>
	<li>Visit this website for checking the Handset Compatibility&nbsp;<a href="https://jazz.com.pk/jazzfi">https://jazz.com.pk/jazzfi</a>.</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <p><strong>VoWiFi Complaint Handling:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>We will follow normal network and deduction related complaint handling process to handle customer complaints</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong> Charging mechanism will remain the same i.e. free incentive will be used and incase no free incentive then base rate will be charged</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Volte is pre-requisite to use VoWiFi</li>
	<li>Latest software in handset (Android 12 &amp; above)</li>
	<li>Software built in hndset supporting VoWiFi</li>
	<li>VoWiFi enabled in handset</li>
	<li>Sim must be in WiFi enabled handset</li>
	<li>4G supporting Sim</li>
	<li>Good Wifi network (100Kbps speed)&nbsp;You may also conduct an Internet speed-test via <strong>http://www.speedtest.net/</strong>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Sufficient balance/incentive for voice &amp; SMS subscription</li>
	<li>
	<p>For Network complaints while using VoWiFi</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Agent will check customer handset if vowifi is supported <strong>(both prepaid and postpaid) </strong>and a wifi network available</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Agent will guide customer about vowifi and its features to avoid network issue</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Agent will activate volte on customer number along with vowifi and will not acknowledge any complaint regarding network</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>In case, customer insist to launch network complaint than agent will recommend to activate Vowifi along with network complaint</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Kindly note, currently IOS (apple) does not support vowifi , hence it is mandatory to check handset eligibility before guiding customer about vowifi</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Probe if VoWiFi symbol is visible or not before acknowledging complaint</p>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Vo-Wifi (Voice Over Wifi) are voice and video call standards over any Wifi</li>
	<li>The Voice over Wi-Fi (Vo-WiFi) service, also called Wi-Fi Calling, enables subscribers to use smartphones that support Vo-WiFi to make voice or video calls through any available Wi-Fi connection.</li>
	<li>Vo-WiFi Improves indoor coverage even where there is no jazz signals. Better call quality (Ultra HD Voice), faster call setup time, efficient use of Network resources and No extra app needed.</li>
	<li>VoWifi calls will be considered as normal calls. Hence default call tariff will apply on it and in case of incentives, consumption will be from DA.</li>
	<li>For LBC offer scenarios VoWifi calls will be part of ALOCs defined and consumption will be from LBC offers except for following case.
	<ul>
		<li><em>Customer connected to VoWifi on airplane mode or in no network situation, default tariff will be applicable even if customer has LBC subscribed since location will not be fetched. </em></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Vo-Wifi be not be available on International outbound roaming.</li>
	<li>Vo-Wifi feature are&nbsp;available to all existing VoLTE enabled handsets.</li>
	<li>Vo-Wifi works on both Prepaid &amp; Postpaid</li>
	<li>Vo-Wifi has no mutual exclusivity dependency for any service.</li>
	<li>VoWiFi to VoWiFi and VoWiFi to VoLTE both ways video call is possible
	<ul>
		<li>For Jazz employees, currently direct video calling is disabled</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>VoWiFi visibility is available at CSRTB (Under VAS Family where VoVoLTE is shown)</li>
	<li>Current implemented VoLTE complaint handling procedures would be followed for VoWiFi as well so VoWiFi related complaints should be launched except quality of service related issues on public WiFi</li>
	<li>Complete visibility for VoWiFi is available in CX HLR Portal</li>
	<li>Currently there is no seperate visibility of VoWifi calls in CDR&rsquo;s to identify that customer is calling over GSM or VoWifi.
	<ul>
		<li>Behaviour of Vo-Wifi is same as VoLTE so there is no segregation of Vo-Wifi at CDR visibility level or billing end.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 15695

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: BIP - complaint handling 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>BIP is a social platform which is used for messaging, calling, HD video calling, group chats &amp;&nbsp;message translation in different languages.</p>

<p>Below mentioned steps should be checked for customer complaints.</p>
<quillbot-extension-portal></quillbot-extension-portal>
Submission Channel: 1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: mehroz.fatima
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <ul>
	<li>How many people participate in BiP support group calls?
	<ul>
		<li>Unlike its competitors, BiP supports HD quality voice and video calls for up to ten people.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Where can I change the BiP message and call tones?
	<ul>
		<li>You can customize your message and call tones by going to More &ndash;&gt; Settings&ndash;&gt; Notification settings.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>How do I create a backup?
	<ul>
		<li>You can back up your messages by following the More &ndash;&gt; Settings&ndash;&gt; Chat Settings &ndash;&gt; Backup steps.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>What exactly is chat pinning?
	<ul>
		<li>You can use the chat pin feature to keep your important chats at the top of the chat window at all times. It is sufficient to hold down the desired chat and press the &quot;pin&quot; button. You can pin up to five chats at a time.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>How do I change the size of the text?
	<ul>
		<li>Application by following the &quot;More -&gt; Settings -&gt; Appearance&quot; steps, regardless of your device&#39;s settings.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>When BiP is deleted, will all my data be deleted as well?
	<ul>
		<li>Yes. If you delete your account, all of your data, backups, and chats are permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>
<quillbot-extension-portal></quillbot-extension-portal>

	<li>App to App calling related issues will be handled by turkcell (BIP)) team.</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Prepaid Call Details Extraction Facility
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase Prepaid customer visit Business center to get call details then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 1058
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: sabeeha.riaz
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6115
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>
	<p>Collect cash amount from customer</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>To extract call details via BVS</p>

	<p>Go to CSRTB--&gt;Enter number in contracts--&gt;Go to consumption tab--&gt;Go to on demand CDRS --&gt; Click BVS verification--&gt; Take customer consent and BVS--&gt; Click download CDR for less than 30 days--&gt;Either email (PDF) or print call details--&gt;Charges will be Rs.100</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Customer will do Biometric and Memo will be created for verification, after it download option will be visible in&nbsp;<strong>&ldquo;On Demand CDR&rdquo;</strong>&nbsp;Tab. After clicking on it agent&nbsp;will have a text box for email having default email address of user which is already updated in system&nbsp;but agent can change it&nbsp; upon customer&#39;s request and enter new email address to get the link for PDF of CDRs.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>If customer insist to hand over call details in print form then agent need to send call details on his/her email address and take a print of details.&nbsp;</p>
	</li>
	<li>Charges will be automatically entered in DPOS</li>
	<li>Call Details will send to customer via Email&nbsp;</li>
	<li>MEMO will be generated in CSRTB for call details extraction</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:&nbsp;</strong>Enable cookies and disable popup blocker on Google Chrome browser to download the file.&nbsp;Seek help from local IT if required.</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Prepaid Call Details with Charging is available from business centers only against any prepaid jazz number, we can share charged events details (i.e. Calls, SMS, Data, VAS &amp; Bundles) incurred during last 30 days (on customer demand)</li>
	<li>Customer has&nbsp;sufficent balance(100Rs ) in his/her account</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Every time we fetch the data (even less than 15/30 days), Rs 100 will be charged</li>
	<li>Fetching details FOC, is also available (for exceptional cases)</li>
	<li>Charges will remain same i.e. Rs.100 for 1 day upto 30 day</li>
	<li>We can provide the Call Details of current User only</li>
	<li>If a customer demands for the Call Details of last 30 days of a number which is converted on his name 10 days ago then BCE can&rsquo;t provide him the details of last 30 days but for the last 10 days only</li>
	<li>Take BVS verification before printing or emailing the details</li>
	<li>Must check the last COO date (till last 30 days) as we will provide the details of only current owner</li>
	<li>Logins accessing customer CDR are being maintained under strict supervision for complaint handling</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Recharge Blocking/Double Balance Offer Handling 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>This process covers cases where customer is facing incoming/outgoing calls/SMS/data issue and it is identified (through blocking reason) that number is blocked in CSRTB due to no recharge activity during last 90 days, below steps will be taken for resolution.&nbsp;</p>

<p><u><strong>SMS Broadcast:</strong></u></p>

<p><em>&quot;Moaziz Sarif, Apni SIM band honay se bachanay k lye Jazz Load kijye. Load na karnay ki surat me aap ki SIM 01-Sep-23 ko band hojayegi. Tafselat k lye 111 milaen&quot;</em></p>

<p><u><strong>Standard Statement:</strong></u></p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Urdu: </strong><em>&quot;Moaziz Sarif, aap nay pichlay 90 din ya is se zaed arsay mai Jazz ke Network pe koi recharge aur balance istimaal nahi kya jis ki waja se aap ki SIM block hogai hai. Baraye meharbani apna number bahaal karnay k liay apna balance recharge kar ke istimaal kijiye. Jaisay hi aap nay balance recharge kar k istimaal kia to aap ka number foran bahaal hojayega. Shukria&quot;</em></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><strong>English: </strong><em>&quot;Dear Customer, your SIM was blocked as you had not recharged &amp; used your balance for 90 days or above on Jazz Network. Kindly recharge &amp; use your balance to unblock your number. Once you have recharged &amp; used your balance, your number will get unblocked automatically. Thank you.&quot;</em></li>
</ul>

<p><u><strong>Social Media Statement:</strong></u></p>

<p>If a customer contacts Jazz via Social Medial channels, customer would be asked to contact via DM as per protocol using given below statement&nbsp;and then would be responded with the suggested standard statements in DM given above.&nbsp;</p>

<p><em>&ldquo;Dear Customer, Kindly contact us via Direct Message. Thank you.&rdquo;</em></p>

Submission Channel: 1058,27,1050,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: mehroz.fatima
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6131
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>What SMS text will be sent to customer in case of Incoming Blocking?</strong></p>

<p>Below SMS text will be sent to customer:</p>

<p><em>Apna number band honay se bachanay k liay jald Jazz Load kijiye.Load na karnay ki surat me aap ki SIM 20-Apr-23 ko band hojayegi.Tafseelat k liyai 111 milaien</em></p>

<p><strong>Why has my number been blocked?</strong></p>

<p>You haven&rsquo;t recharged or used your balance since last 90 days on Jazz&rsquo;s Network</p>

<p><strong>How can I Reactivate my number?</strong></p>

<p>Just do a minimum recharge from any medium to real time activate your number.</p>

<p><strong>How long will my number remain blocked if I don&rsquo;t recharge?</strong></p>

<p>It will remain permanently blocked until customer does a minimum recharge.</p>

<p><strong>Will any restoration fee be charged upon recharge?</strong></p>

<p>No Restoration Fee will be charged upon recharge.</p>

<p><strong>What will happen if customer doesn&rsquo;t recharge and attempts to a make an outgoing call?</strong></p>

<p>When a blocked subscriber, who hasn&rsquo;t recharged, attempts to make an outgoing call, an IVR will be played, or SMS will be sent mentioning number is blocked due to recharge inactivity.</p>

<p><strong>What will be the IVR prompt?</strong></p>

<p>English: You cannot make this call due to restriction set by administrator.</p>

<p>Urdu: Moaziz Sarif, Jazz ki behtareen services hasil karnay k liay kasrat se apna balance recharge kar ke istimaal kijiye. Pichlay 90 din ya is se zaed arsay mai Jazz ke Network pe koi recharge aur balance istimaal na karnay ki surat me SIM block hojayegi. Aap ke tawun ka Shukria.</p>

<p><strong>Will the P2P amount also be considered for Restoration?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, Example: if a number is Suspended on reason &ldquo;RechargeBlock&rdquo; and customer receive minimum amount required for restoration i-e receive Rs.50 via &ldquo;P2P Balance Share&rdquo;, number will be restored.</p>

<p><strong>How long will my number remain active upon Recharge?</strong></p>

<p>Your number will remain active for next 90 days upon recharge, in the meantime if you recharge or use balance between these 90 days, your activation will reset for next 90 days that day onwards.</p>

<p><strong>When will my number be blocked if I don&#39;t recharge?</strong></p>

<p>Number will be blocked per the date mentioned in the message.</p>

<p><strong>What services can I use when number is blocked?</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>&nbsp;Incoming &amp; Outgoing calls will be blocked.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Outgoing SMS is blocked.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Incoming SMS will be allowed.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Jazz Helpline will be allowed.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Recharge USSD should be available including JazzCash USSD</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>How much amount of recharge I have to do in order to activate my number?</strong></p>

<p>You just need to do a minimum recharge or greater to activate your number</p>

Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Number must be active for pre to post conversion.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>In case number barring (INCOMING CALL) is active, first perform the required activity to remove barring &amp; then perform conversion.</li>
</ul>

<p>Please find below the text intimation sent to customer:&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Pre-Blocking Broadcast Text:</strong></p>

<p><em>&ldquo;Moaziz Sarif, Apni SIM band honay se bachanay k lye aaj hi Jazz Load kijye. Load na karnay ki surat me Monday ko SIM band ho jayegi. Tafsilat k lye 111 milaen&rdquo;</em></p>

<p><strong>Post-Blocking Broadcast Text:</strong></p>

<p><em>&ldquo;Moaziz Sarif, balance na honay ki waja se apki SIM pe Incoming band kr di gai he. Apni SIM Active krne k lye abhi Jazz Load kijiye. Tafsilat k lye 111 milaen&rdquo;</em></p>

View Type: BackEndTeam

SOP Status: Active

<p><span style="color:#16a085">Should I narrate channels through which you may recharge? &lt; If customer says &ldquo;Yes&rdquo; then Agent to narrate channels available for recharge as per system / process&gt;</span></p>

	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li>If balance was not deducted during this activity then please proceed as per normal Jazz Adjustment complaint handling</li>

&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Complaint will be acknowledged after 2 working days of recharge<br />
o&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;For Example if recharge is done on Thursday then complaint will be acknowledged on Saturday, however if recharge is done on Friday then complaint will be acknowledged on Tuesday<br />

Frequently Asked Questions: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case of Pandapro code not working or is invalid</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The customer will directly raise the complaint to Foodpanda by following the below steps.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," style="height:243px; width:526px" /></span></span></p>

Service Request Activity: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt">Customer Journey:</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers shall subscribe to the respective Pre/postpaid bundles as stated in the above eligibility criteria section</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Once the customer receives the bundle subscription confirmation message, the system will send the Pandapro coupon <em>(within the 30 minutes of the bundle subscription)</em> to the customer for the free subscription to Pandapro service </span></span></li>

Click here to avail your offer <a href="https://bit.ly/JazzPandaPro">https://bit.ly/JazzPandaPro</a>&rdquo;</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Upon clicking on the mentioned link user will be redirected to the Pandapro subscription page</span></span>.</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Step by step pandapro offer activation journey is given below</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," style="height:237px; width:526px" /></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Complaint Handing:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will first verify if complaint is genuine or not.</li>
	<li>Go to CSRTB--&gt; check if Prepaid or postpaid bundle/package is activated or not.</li>
	<li>Agent will check coupon status from campaign &nbsp;link&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li><span style="background-color:#f1c40f">http://portal.jazz.com.pk:9080/IBMMCCM/</span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>In case of code is not received and the subscription is verified, self completed case in Super office-- &gt;Billing Adjustment/Foodpanda promo will be created.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Agent needs to mention complete details in complaint notes:
	<ul>
		<li><strong>Package Name:</strong></li>
		<li><strong>Package Activation Time:</strong></li>
		<li><strong>Issue</strong></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Agent will guide customer upfront if complaint is not genuine &amp; will excuse.and will not acknowledge any complaint in this regard.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Agent will guide customer upfront if complaint is not genuine &amp; will excuse.</li>
	<li>If complaint is correct, Agent will raise the complaint and guide the customer about the 72&nbsp;hours TAT</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt">Eligibility Criteria:</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Prepaid Customers can avail of this offer after the subscription of monthly freedom and monthly X bundles</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Postpaid Customers can avail of this offer after converting their base package to any of the postpaid Red series packages.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Promotion Mechanics:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Free pandapro code expiry is 3 days</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Benefits of pandapro subscriptions are given below;&nbsp; &nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Up to 40% off on selected restaurants on both delivery and dine-in.</li>
		<li>10 free deliveries per month</li>
		<li>Extra 5% off on pick up.</li>
		<li>2 X 10% off coupons on pandamart/shops</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Upon the multiple subscriptions of Jazz bundle user will get multiple pandapro subscription coupons</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Pandapro offer can be subscribed once, multiple subscription is not allowed on pandapro service</li>
	<li>&nbsp; Expiry of pandapro service is 30 days</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Staff Related Complaints against Retailers (FSE's)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:14px">Incase when a <strong>Customer Compliants against Jazz Retailer </strong>on any frontend channel<strong>.</strong> Below process will&nbsp;be followed by FSE&#39;s (Backend)</span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><strong>Process For FSE&#39;s:</strong></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:14px">While handling staff related complaint against retailers following guidelines are to be followed&nbsp;</span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px">FSE to download the day-1 data from eFront</span></li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:14px">eFront &rarr;Completer tab &rarr;&nbsp;sorted report</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:14px">Select the &ldquo;from&rdquo; &amp; &ldquo;to&rdquo; date (e.g. on 27th Oct, extract 26th Oct data by selected both dates as 26th Oct)</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:14px"><strong>Activity type:</strong> General Complaint-Staff/Office Related</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:14px">Click on &ldquo;xlsx Report&rdquo;</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:14px">Report will be downloaded in excel format</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:14px">Each FSE to share the data to their relevant retailers TSS/AM</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:14px">TSS/AM to take the required action / coach the retailer</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:14px">After taking the action / coaching the retailer by TSS/AM, and share the feedback to FSE,FSE close the activity after adding remarks in &ldquo;Add notes&rdquo; window of the particular case</span></p>

	<ul>
		<li>
		<p><span style="font-size:14px">eFront&nbsp;&rarr;&nbsp;Completer tab</span></p>
		</li>
		<li>
		<p><span style="font-size:14px">Enter customer / complainant MSISDN in Mobile Number field &amp; search</span></p>
		</li>
		<li>
		<p><span style="font-size:14px">Click on &ldquo;edit&rdquo; option available against the activity</span></p>
		</li>
		<li>
		<p><span style="font-size:14px">After adding the remarks (as per action taken against the complaint) &nbsp;in &ldquo;Add notes&rdquo; field, select the appropriate activity status e.g. Completed / Cancelled / Invalid or Planned / Routedto / Hold and press &ldquo;Save&rdquo;</span></p>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><strong>Escalation Process:</strong></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px">FSE to download the day-1 data from eFront and share the data with relevant TSS/AM close these complaints in next 24 hours</span></li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:14px">In case regional TSS.AM not sharing feedback than all such compliant will be highlighted to CP via emails through FSM.</span></p>
	</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1044,1045
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6106
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px">Mentioned in Process Overview</span></li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.

Service Request Activity: <p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customers&#39; who have recently received intimation regarding their service class/subscription type change from AJK/GB to NWD, below standard statement will be used&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">English</span></span></u></strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">:</span></span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="background-color:yellow"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Dear Customer, these messages were sent to apprise you that your package plan&nbsp;is applicable to activate all available bundles. To check available bundles, dial *444# or use SIMOSA App. Thank you.</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Urdu:</span></span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="background-color:yellow"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Moaziz Sarif, aap ko yeh messages agah karnay k liay bhejay gaye hain ke aap k package plan&nbsp;pe ab tamam dastiyab bundles lagaye jaa saktay hain. Dastiyab bundles check karne ke liye *444# dial karein ya SIMOSA App istemal karein. Shukria</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

	<li>Service Class in CSRTB</li>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Standard Statement:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Why can I not subscribe this bundle? / Why is bundle discontinued? / Which alternate bundles are available?</span></span></strong><br />
<br />
<span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Dear Customer, in order to&nbsp;maintain service quality&nbsp;in AJK/GB, certain bundles&nbsp;will not be available for subscription&nbsp;from 31-Aug-2024.&nbsp;However, other available bundles can be activated via&nbsp;SIMOSA App. Thank you.&nbsp;<br />
<br />
Moaziz Sarif, AJK/GB mein service ke may&rsquo;yar ko barkarar rakhne ke liye kuch bundles 31-Aug-2024 se dastyaab nahi honge. Deegar dastyab bundles SIMOSA App ke zariye lagaye jaa sakte hain. Shukria<br />
<br />
<em>In case customer requests other available bundle -&gt; As per defined handling, agent to guide customer about available bundles as per validity requested by customer.&nbsp;</em></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Would these bundles be available again? /&nbsp;If yes, when?</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Dear Customer, these bundles&nbsp;will not be available for subscription&nbsp;for the time being in order to&nbsp;maintain service quality&nbsp;in AJK/GB.&nbsp;However, you can activate other available bundles via&nbsp;SIMOSA App. Thank you.&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Moaziz Sarif, AJK/GB mein&nbsp;service ke may&rsquo;yar ko barkarar rakhne ke liye&nbsp;filhaal ye bundles dastyaab nahi honge. Deegar dastyab bundles SIMOSA App ke zariye lagaye jaa sakte hain. Shukria</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">In case customer requests other available bundles -&gt; As per defined handling, agent to guide customer about available bundles as per validity requested by customer.&nbsp;</span></span></em></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">What will happen to my bundle incentive after bundle is discontinued?</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Dear Customer, bundle incentive will remain available&nbsp;only until expiry of the&nbsp;bundle.&nbsp;No remaining bundle incentive&nbsp;will be available once the bundle expires. Thank you</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Moaziz Sarif, bundle k incentive&nbsp;sirf&nbsp;bundle expire hone&nbsp;tak&nbsp;kabil-e-istemal honge. Bundle ki muddat khatam hone&nbsp;pe Bundle ke koi bhi baqiya incentive&nbsp;dastyab nahi honge. Shukria</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">In case customer requests other available bundles -&gt; As per defined handling, agent to guide customer about available bundles as per validity requested by customer.&nbsp;</span></span></em></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Why are these bundles discontinued only for AJK/GB residents while they are still available for other regions in Pakistan?</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Dear Customer, in order to&nbsp;maintain service quality&nbsp;in AJK/GB, certain bundles&nbsp;will not be available for subscription&nbsp;from 31-Aug-2024.&nbsp;However, other available bundles can be activated via&nbsp;SIMOSA App. Thank you.&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Moaziz Sarif, AJK/GB mein&nbsp;service ke may&rsquo;yar ko barkarar rakhne ke liye&nbsp;kuch bundles 31-Aug-2024 se dastyaab nahi honge. Deegar dastyab bundles SIMOSA App ke zariye lagaye jaa sakte hain. Shukria</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><em><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">In case customer requests other available bundle -&gt; As per defined handling, agent to guide customer about available bundles as per validity requested by customer.</span></span></em><br />
&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Mandatory Guideline:</span></span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">For alternate offer activation, it is mandatory for agent to guide customer to use SIMOSA App for eligible offers.</span></span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Customer will not be able to change their service class from AJK/GB by dialing any of the strings. </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">The base rate for the AJK/GB service class will be same as of Champion package.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">No amount from customer will be charged for service class migration.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Note:&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong><em><u><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Front End Sale Journey:</span></span></u></em></strong></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The agent logs in to Kistpay&rsquo;s website at </span></span><a href="https://jazz-portal.kistpay.com/" style="color:#467886; text-decoration:underline">https://jazz-portal.kistpay.com/</a> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;(Credentials will be provided separately for each franchise)</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The agent fills out the application on to the Kistpay portal (sales process guide is updated in KMS)</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The customer pays the down payment 50% using his own Jazz Cash or can pay over the counter under the header of &ldquo;<strong>Jazz handset Installment Plan</strong>&rdquo; </span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Jazz cash App Method ( Loan repayment &gt; Jazz handset installment Plan )</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">USSD</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"> code is *<strong>786*5*3*39#</strong> &gt; Enter MSISDN (MSISDN on which handset is availed on installment) &gt; Enter MPIN</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">After a successful down payment, the application status changes to &quot;Allocate Device.&quot; The agent then enters the IMEI 1 &amp; IMEI 2 numbers of the handset in the dedicated section of the portal.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The agent helps the customer unbox the phone (Agent will guide the customer that handset will be unboxed during activation journey)</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">It is mandatory to setup the handset with the available Wifi/Internet, else handset will not be activated </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">After setting up the phone , agent will click &ldquo;Unlock&rdquo; in the kistpay portal to activate the handset , else handset will not active</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset will not be handed over to the customer without proper activation and payment</span></span></span></span></li>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The Kistpay financing app comes pre-installed on the phones. It block/unblock the device and remind about payments through in App notifications</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer will receive SMS notification regarding pending payments</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer can see all the details about the payment plan on the Kistpay app</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer will receive payment reminders via SMS before 7 Days , 3 Days ,and before 24 Hrs</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">No BVS or SIM activation required</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">Handling of dead-on arrival cases:</span></span></span></span>
	<ol>
		<li style="list-style-type:none">
		<ul>
			<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">If the customer opens the handset within franchise and handset is found dead, in that case agent will provide new handset to the customer (Kistpay will support to replace the IMEI in system) It is mandatory to get the IMEI replaced in portal</span></span></span></li>
			<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Agent will send email to sales Ops team , sales Ops team will contact &nbsp;warehouse team to identify the vendor , after identification of vendor handset will be dispatched to the vendor .</span></span></span></li>
			<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">If the customer takes the phone and walks out of <span style="color:black">the Experience center, then </span>in that case the customer has to take the phone to the respective manufacturer service center</span></span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ol>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">For warranty claim services , customer needs to visit the respective service center </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Unsold inventory will be under the responsibility of respective franchise </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case of non-payment of instalment, system will do the blocking of IMEI which will be restored after making payment</span></span> </span></span></li>

TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 17759

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Experience Center or Franchise Staff Related Complaints - Outbound Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This process covers guidelines for handling customer complaints&rsquo; regarding poor behavior or misleading information provided by Franchise or Experience Center Staff. </span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 3082
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: ruqqia.bibi1
Type (SOP/Complaint): Complaint
Verification Status: 6187
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Agent will create below staff related activity in Service Now and guide customer 24 Hours TAT.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em>Service Now &gt;&gt; Efront &gt;&gt; Create New Activity &gt;&gt; <strong>Activity Type</strong>: General Complaints &ndash; Staff/Office Related &gt;&gt; fill relevant details</em></span></span></p>

Checklist Items: <p><u><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="color:#333333">Mandatory Checklist:</span></strong></span></span></span></u></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Agent will ask complete details of area along with city to distinguish between Retailer shop/Franchise/Experience Centers.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Details regarding the incident to be mentioned in detail in activity notes to for issue rectification.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Verify claimed activity through relevant system(s).</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Mention staff name or male/female or counter number as an identifier (where available)</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Before making any complaint, consult KMS for any known issue at front-end channel or type of service available at specific location, as claimed by the customer.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:yellow">OCN is mandatory to mention, however where customer claims that he does not have any other number, the same can be mentioned.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Required Questions: <ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer Name</span></span></li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Agent to verify duplicate complaint (if any) and guide customer accordingly. </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">If customer wants to add any information, agent can add relevant remarks in open/existing complaint.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Where complaint status is closed with complete resolution/notes mentioned by respective user, agent will provide resolution instead of creating a new complaint for same issue.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Category: Both
