<ul>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Bundle Name</strong> &ndash; Specify the affected bundle.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Subscription Channel</strong> &ndash; Identify whether the attempt was made via EasyPaisa, HBL, Meezan Bank, or another channel.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Date &amp; Time</strong> &ndash; Record the exact date and time of the subscription attempt.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Amount to be Posted</strong> &ndash; The agent must verify the bundle subscription price and the available balance. If the subscription failed and usage was charged at PayG rates, the remaining balance to be posted should be calculated accordingly.</p>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong>&nbsp;Mandatory to mention above in summary.</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Probe Recharge History &amp; Bundle Deduction</strong> &ndash; <span style="color:#2980b9">Verify if the recharge was processed and whether the bundle amount was deducted.</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Confirm Date &amp; Time of Subscription</strong> &ndash; <span style="color:#2980b9">Check when the subscription request was initiated.</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Probe Missing Minutes</strong> &ndash; <span style="color:#2980b9">Validate if the allocated minutes were provided to the customer.</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Probe Missing SMS</strong> &ndash; <span style="color:#2980b9">Ensure that the SMS quota was credited correctly.</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Probe Missing MBs</strong> &ndash; <span style="color:#2980b9">Check if the internet data was successfully allocated.</span></p>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: COMPLAINT

ID: 17941

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Data Complaints- No Browsing
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&quot;<strong>Data Complaints - No Browsing Issue</strong>&quot; typically refers to a situation where a customer has an active mobile data package but is unable to use it for browsing the internet or accessing online services. </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Below are some possible causes and their solutions:</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:#f1c40f">Issues Faced by Customer</span></strong>: </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Temporary outages, weak signal strength, or high network congestion</span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:center">&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:#f1c40f">Diagnosis</span>:</strong> First of all check the network status in the area provided by the customer from Customer Konnect Portal </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Konnet portal usage is mentioned under below KMS SOP, Konnect portal usage is mandatory in order to handle data complaints </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a href="https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/17938" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/17938</a></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="background-color:#f1c40f">Common Causes of NO BROWSING issues</span></u></strong>:</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Below are the possible issues due to which customer is facing &ldquo;No Browsing&rdquo;</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Insufficient Data</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Device Related Problems</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Network Issues</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Configuration Problems</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Sim Card blocking/Account related issues</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Service Provider limitations</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Technical Breakdown/maintenance</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="background-color:#f1c40f">Frontend Empowerment &amp; Self-Service Remedies</span>:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please note we need to resolve customer &ldquo;No browsing&rdquo; complaints by using frontend empowerment guidelines or guide self-services methods as most of the complaints arise due to above mentioned situations.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="background-color:#2ecc71">Mandatory</span></u></strong>: It is mandatory to use below mentioned self-services in order to resolve customer&rsquo;s issue as per situation and complaint of the customer before forwarding cellular complaint in system</span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Data Barring Active:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Incase of data barring is active we need to remove data barring from HLR and ask customer to try again issue will be resolved </span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Handset Settings:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Check HLR <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> if SGSN is reflecting, APN is correctly selected no need to verify APN Settings</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Check HLR <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> if SGSN is not reflecting, APN is not selected we need to verify below APN Settings steps</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&nbsp;Move to the next step settings should be verified from customer via probing</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:square">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Normal APN</u></strong>: Settings <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> More <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Mobile Networks <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Access Point Names <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Press Menu Option <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> New APN <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Name: Jazz, APN: Jazz <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Press ok/save <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Restart Mobile Phone</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>For IR</u></strong>: APN should be &quot;jazz&quot; (in all small letters)</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Network Mode</u>:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Network mode will be selected as &ldquo;AUTO&rdquo; else data will not work</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Correct Sim Card Selection:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Jazz SIM should be selected from sim card manager option as default on data (For All Handsets)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer is using a handset in which Sim card manager option is not available we need to guide the customer to use put the sim in sim slot 1 for issue resolution</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>4G Compatible Handset:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Handset Should be 4G Compatible/Selected network mode<span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span>LTE</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Known Tickets:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Incase of known tickets/network tickets on Konnect we need to guide the customer that network issue in known in their area and tech teams will resolve it ASAP</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Slow Browing during Incoming Calls:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer is facing issue of slow browsing during incoming calls OR unable to receive Incoming calls then we will politely guide customer it is a handset dependent feature</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Deletion of Browsing History:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer is facing no browsing and he is in coverage area as per Konnect portal we need to guide the customer to delete browsing to delete Cookies/history/cache &amp; restart the handset&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></li>
</ul>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Avoid using location-based searches for numbers, as there is a limited number of searches available for location queries. Instead, use Data CDR to retrieve relevant information.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Manual ISMS settings should be applied based on the device&#39;s operating system as a first attempt. (As referred in point no 2 of &ldquo;<u>Frontend Empowerment &amp; Self-Service Remedies&quot;</u></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Always request the customer&rsquo;s alternate contact number when logging a complaint. Additionally, guide them about the callback number 0308-4400333 (NDC).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer&rsquo;s location is in Azad Kashmir or Rawalakot, there is no need to consult the Konnect Portal. The complaint can be logged directly after verifying the complete checklist and mention exact location.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In some cases, complaints have been acknowledged without verifying if the customer had balance or remaining MBs. Ensure to check both balance and data availability before proceeding.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For video downloading issues, confirm the customer&rsquo;s balance, as such downloads may be charged at base rates even if the customer has a Social Bundle or Monthly SMS Bundle.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Avoid advising customers to clear cache/cookies or restart their device without consulting the system first.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the issue is related to a specific app (e.g., WhatsApp, Facebook, YouTube), guide the customer to reset or reinstall the application.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Handling is applicable on complete No-Browsing situations</span></span></li>
</ul>
